Reeky is probably hiding in his poachers' hideout. If I find the hideout, I'll find Reeky.
瑞奇可能藏在偷猎藏身处。如果我找到了这个藏身处，我就会找到瑞奇。
The bathhouse wench told me that Reeky used to come and see her after his poaching raids and on his way he usually stopped off at the woodcutters' camp on the hills east of Ledetchko.
洗浴女告诉我瑞奇过去经常在偷猎之后来看她，他回来的时候总会在伐木工营地停留片刻，营地就在拉迪亚茨克东边的山里。
In exchange for the treatment I got at his mill, the miller wanted me to get him a ring that was buried with a corpse under the gibbet. I dug up the corpse, but the ring wasn't there.
为了偿还我在他磨坊里受到的救治，磨坊主想让我取来一枚随尸体一起被埋在绞刑架底下的戒指。我把尸体挖了出来，但是戒指不在那里。
Peshek wants me to get him a ring from an executed man who's buried under the gibbet. It's either that or pay him back in coin.
皮社科想要我拿到一个被处决的人的戒指，他被埋在绞刑架底下。要么这样，要么直接还他钱。
Josef also asked me to get a cure for his condition. The herb woman should be able to help with that. She lives somewhere in the woods downstream along the creek.
杰瑞还让我治疗他的现状。那个采药婆应该可以提供帮助。她住在森林溪水下游处。

I had been worrying needlessly. I got all the information I needed and more! Pity it couldn't have been done without captivity and torture... But now I knew the villain behind everything was Istvan Toth, who was always one step ahead of us and was preparing an attack. He had many men at Vranik and was already envisioning himself as the new liege lord in this fiefdom. And what he said about me and Sir Radzig… Could it possibly be true I am his son?
之前我的担心都是毫无意义的，现在我不仅收集到了战事需要的信息，而且还了解到更多的秘密！只可惜这一切都是监禁与折磨换来的……我现在知道真相了。托思大人是一切阴谋的幕后主使，他抢在我们之前，正在准备一场袭击。他在瓦兰尼克囤积了许多人马，妄图变成领主在此称霸一方。至于他所描述的我和拉德季大人的关系……我真的有可能是他的儿子吗？
After the trial with the Combat Master, I am to speak with Erik.
在战斗教官那里接受测试以后，我得向厄里克汇报。

Reeky, one of the Neuhof gang, really was hiding out in an old mineshaft. And with good reason, as it turned out. Shortly after I found out from him where another member of the gang was, we were ambushed.
瑞奇，洗劫诺伊霍夫的土匪，真的躲在旧矿井里。并且有充分的理由藏匿在那儿。我从他那里打听到其他同伙在哪的时候，我们就中了埋伏。

Reeky, one of the Neuhof gang, really was hiding out in an old mineshaft. And with good reason, as it turned out. Unfortunately I came too late and he was already in the hands of the bandits, who intended to give him the same treatment as Limpy Lubosh.
瑞奇，洗劫诺伊霍夫的土匪，真的躲在旧矿井里。并且有充分的理由藏匿在那儿。不幸的是我来得太晚了，他已经被土匪抓住了。那些人准备像对待跛子卢波一样对待他。

Reeky, one of the Neuhof gang, really was hiding out in an old mineshaft. And with good reason, as it turned out. Unfortunately I came too late and he was already in the hands of the same bandits who tortured Limpy Lubosh to death. Fortunately, this time they didn't finish the job and I managed to get some answers.
瑞奇，洗劫诺伊霍夫的土匪，真的躲在旧矿井里。并且有充分的理由藏匿在那儿。不巧的是我来得太晚了，他已经被折磨死跛子卢波的土匪抓住了。幸运的是，在他们弄死他之前，我还是成功地打听到了一些答案。
I see there's no point in fighting with oafs, so I tried to teach that fellow some manners. And lo and behold, it worked! Now that soldier behaves like a courtier!
我觉得没必要与傻瓜打架，所以我试图教这些家伙一些修养！
Fight fire with fire. I taught that fellow a lesson in chivalry. I trust he learned some manners and won't go back to his old ways.
以毒攻毒。我教了这家伙一课。我相信他学到了一些礼仪并且不会走回他的老路了。
Apart from the locked door, the Bailiff needed to get his trunk open too, so I opened it for him.
除大门外，执政官的箱子也需要打开，所以我帮他打开。
Apart from the door, the Bailiff's trunk is also locked and he doesn't have the key for that either. I should help him open it.
除大门外，执政官的箱子的钥匙也丢了，所以我帮他打开。
There's nothing more I can do here. I should go back to Sir Radzig.
我做的足够多了。我应该去向拉德季大人回复了。
I managed to convince the Bailiff to go and apologise to her. Maybe now she'll give him back the keys and everything will be fine.
我让执政官去道歉了。也许现在她会把钥匙还回去，然后皆大欢喜。

Since the Bailiff is an important dignitary who won't apologise to some old hag from the woods, I decided to get the keys back by any means available. What's the life of one old crone compared to the honour and welfare of the Bailiff?
因为执政官是个不会轻易向什么丛林里的老太太道歉的达官显贵，我决定去用任何方式把钥匙夺回来。老婆婆的老命哪里能和执政官的荣誉相提并论？

The merchant told me all about their nighttime adventure. He took leave of the Bailiff somewhere by the creek in Samopesch and when he saw him again, the Bailiff's face was painted and he had a wreath of nettles on his head.
商人告诉了我他们晚上的事情。当他再次看到执政官时，执政官的脸上被画了，头上被人放了荨麻做的花圈。

Just as I was handing over the shroud, an angry mob interrupted our business and the charlatan was obliged to make a rapid strategic exit. Fortunately, he had time enough to tell me my reward was in his trunk.
在交给他裹尸布的时候，一个凶悍的匪徒打断了我们的交易，骗子不得不想办法逃跑。好在他告诉了我报酬就在他的箱子里。
The charlatan doesn't want anyone to see the exchange of the shroud. I should wait at his house.
骗子不想让任何人看到我们转手裹尸布。我得去他家等他。
It's been a while since I've had such a good chance to talk to Theresa, the Miller Peshek's niece. There's something … intriguing about her.
我很久都没有机会跟磨坊主皮社科的侄女特丽莎交谈了。她有些……吸引人。
I haven’t spoken to Theresa for ages. I should stop by and see her. She's got a lot of work at the mill, though, and only has time before noon.
我几年没跟特丽莎说过话了。我应该去拜访一下。
Then we sat down on the grass and had a pleasant chat.
我们在草地上谈笑风生。
Theresa has sat down on the grass and clearly she expects me to join her. I wouldn't want to disappoint her, now would I?
特丽莎坐在草地上，很明显希望我跟她坐一起。我可不能让她失望。
After that I walked Theresa home.
之后我便陪特丽莎回家。
Me and Theresa had a nice day. Time to walk her home again.
我和特丽莎今天过的很愉快。是时候送她回家了。
I went to see Theresa again.
Perhaps I could stop by to see Theresa again.
也许我可以再去见特丽莎一次。
I took her to the Broken Wheel Tavern. That was quite something! We drank, we danced and I had a brawl. I don’t know if that makes me a hero, but I did the right thing!
我把她带到了破轮酒馆。简直棒极了！我们喝酒，我们跳舞，我还打了一架。我不知道那能不能让我看上去像个英雄，但是我知道我做了正确的事情！
I promised Theresa I'd take her to the Broken Wheel Tavern
我答应特丽莎带她去破轮酒馆。
If I want to win, I have to hide.
如果我想赢的话，我就得藏起来。
Then it started raining and Theresa remembered she'd left her laundry outdoors, so we collected it to keep it dry, but we got wet ourselves.
大雨倾盆而下，特丽莎想起来她把洗过的衣服放在屋外了，于是我们必须把它们收起来继续晾干，但我们却成了落汤鸡。
Theresa's laundry is going to get wet. We ought to gather it up quick or she'll have to wash it all over again.
特丽莎的衣物要被浸透了。我们得快点收起来，不然她就要重新洗一遍了。
What had at first seemed like a sincere friendship finally turned into something much bigger. Something between me and Theresa…
原本看起来深厚的友谊变成了种更亲密的关系。有时候特丽莎和我有些共同之处……
We need to go into the barn, quick, so we don’t get any wetter. The washing, and us along with it!
我们需要快点进谷仓，这样我们才不会湿透。不论是衣物还是我们！

Karl, the young noble who was supposed to enter the monastery was sitting in the tavern in Sasau. It was a problem to talk to him confidentially, because his guardian wouldn't take his eyes off him for a moment.
这位计划出家修行的年轻贵族，卡尔，此刻正在莎邵酒馆歇脚。如何自信地上前跟他搭话成了眼下的一大难题，因为他的侍卫一刻不离地在一旁守着他。

The young noble is in the Sasau tavern now. Either I'll have to come to an agreement with him, or I find some other solution. Either way, I will enter the monastery in his place. The monks will be expecting a new novice, and that's what they'll get.
那个年轻贵族此刻正在莎邵酒馆歇脚。要么我去和他做笔交易，要么另寻他法。不管怎样，我都得伪装成他进入修道院。那群僧侣此时正在等候一位新学徒的到来，我就要借此机会乘虚而入。

In the end it turned out that Reeky not only had money hidden, but also a blood-stained gambeson. Naturally he wouldn't want to parade around the village in it. I'd like to hear what his father has to say about it.
最后发现瑞奇不止是藏了钱，还有一件染血的铠甲。自然他不会穿着这铠甲在镇上游荡。我想听听他父亲对此的意见。
Adela told me Reeky has money stashed away. It's buried in the western corner of the smallholding behind the tannery.
阿黛拉告诉我瑞奇藏了些钱。就埋在皮匠铺后小农场的西边角落里。
Leshek didn't tell me anythinng about the sword. But there is something suspicious about him. Maybe i can learn more...
雷士克没告诉我这个剑的事情。但是这件事有蹊跷，我应该调查一下……
Thank the Lord! With the help of Zbyshek I managed to escape from captivity in Vranik. But I still faced the long journey to Rattay in the dark, with Zbyshek or without him.
感谢上苍！在巴舍克的帮助下，我成功逃离了弗拉尼克的土匪营地。但我仍要摸黑走很远才能回到拉泰，我可以选择和巴舍克一起，或者甩掉他。
Now or never! I need to escape from the camp.
机不可失！我得逃离这个营地。
I found out it was Josef's wife who poisoned him by cooking him food from rotten meat.
我发现是杰瑞的妻子想让他吃腐烂的肉毒害他。
I found out it wasn't Marianna, because Josef and the fisherman had two different stories. For sure they were lying to try and put the blame on her.
我发现不是玛丽安娜，因为杰瑞和渔夫有两个不同的故事。我确信他们是尝试说谎让人责骂她。
In the end I took Josef's word for it and accused Marianna of poisoning him.
最终我用杰瑞的话指控玛丽安娜毒害他。

I finally succeeded in staggering back to Rattay and reporting to Sir Hanush and Sir... that is, my father. I had a feeling everything I'd just endured was the easy part and the worst was yet to come...
我成功挨回了拉泰向瀚纳什大人和……我父亲报到。我有种预感，先前经历的都是小风小浪，暴风骤雨还在后面等着。
I have to report back to Rattay as quickly as possible. Sir Hanush and Sir Radzig need to know what's happening right away!
我得尽最快速度赶回拉泰汇报情况。瀚纳什大人和拉德季大人要根据这份情报立即采取行动！
Despite the darkness, I ran into Zbyshek. I still had doubts about whether he deserved my forgiveness.
尽管是摸黑逃走，我还是遇上了巴舍克。我还在犹豫到底要不要宽恕他。
I didn't give a thought to Zbyshek during my escape and went on my way without him. For all I cared, he could rot in the woods!
在我逃脱的过程中，我甩掉了巴舍克，独自逃走了。管他呢，就让他在林子里慢慢腐烂吧！
I ought to meet Zbyshek. Although, after what he did to me in Skalitz…
我应该去与巴舍克会和。尽管，他曾在斯卡里茨背叛过我……
That fellow is a filthy pig. There was no point beating around the bush, so I told him if he carried on with his disgraceful behaviour, he'd get what for! It looks like he got the message.
这家伙就是只下流的猪。这没必要打灌木，所以我告诉他继续可耻的行为，他将会得到什么！看起来他明白了。

The miller told me he had big plans for the Cuman. He was convinced the captive had his ill-gotten gains hidden somewhere and, true to his miller nature, he had every intention of getting his hands on the loot. But he had one problem - the Cuman didn't understand a word of our language, so interrogating him would be quite a challenge.
磨坊主对库曼俘虏有个大计划。他相信库曼人肯定把他们抢来的赃物藏在了某处，而他，像一个真正的磨坊主一样，有充分的理由去找到这些宝藏。但是这里有一个问题——这库曼人对捷克语一字不通，所以审问他就变得很困难了。
The grooms of Budin mentioned something about a Cuman they've captured. Apparently, they're holding him in a barn. If I want to know more, I have to see the miller.
布金的马夫们提到，他们俘虏了一个库曼人。显然他们把他藏在一个谷仓里。如果我想知道更多的话，我应该去见见磨坊主。
I had a chat with Jodok about the wine for the Circators and he asked me if I could help him get it. It's no easy matter, though, since the casks of wine are stored outside the monastery.
我跟约都克说了给巡察使准备酒 的事，他问我能不能帮他取酒。这并非易事，因为那些酒全都存在修道院外面。
It seems Novice Jodok helps to obtain wine for the Circators for their nightly drinking bouts, and I could be of assistance. I should talk to him about it.
看上去是学徒约都克在帮助巡察使搞晚上酒宴喝的酒，我可以帮上点小忙。我应该找他谈谈。
We planned our expedition to get wine for the evening and I was supposed to meet Jodok in the monastery garden. He was already waiting for me there.
我们计划去搞酒局的酒，我应该在修道院庭院里与约都克会面。他已经在那里等我了。
I'm to meet Jodok in the monastery garden this evening.
我要在傍晚去修道院庭院见约都克。
The shepherd rewarded me very generously for it.
牧羊人为此奖励了我很多。
I could go to the shepherd and tell him about it.
我可以去告诉牧羊人这件事。
As I expected, the blacksmith's flute was in his house.
正想我预料的，铁匠的笛子就在他家里。
Now I just have to find that flute. Most likely the blacksmith has it hidden somewhere in his house.
现在我只要去找到那个笛子。铁匠很可能把它藏到了家里。
I gave the flute back to it's rightful owner, the blacksmith.
我把笛子给了它真正的主人-铁匠。
I gave the flute to the farmer. Now maybe things will quieten down in Samopesch.
我爸笛子给了农夫。现在萨莫培什能消停一点了。
I have to bring the flute to the farmer who asked me to steal it from the blacksmith.
我得把笛子带给那个叫我偷笛子的农夫。
Karl's guardian seemed very strict at first, but it turned out he wasn't averse to a game of dice, so I played with him and he even got pretty drunk in the process.
卡尔的侍卫起初表现得很严肃，之后招架不住骰子的诱惑，于是便和我赌了起来，慢慢地就喝得烂醉如泥了。
The guardian has started drinking and I should keep him at it.
这个看守有点醉了，我应该继续灌他
Lady Stephanie has given me an important task. I'm to help with preparations for her cousin's wedding.
斯蒂芬妮夫人给了我一个重要的任务。我得帮着准备她表妹的婚礼。
I found out that Lady Stephanie of Talmberg wants to talk to me. I shouldn't keep her waiting.
我发现塔尔木堡的斯蒂芬妮女士想跟我聊聊。我不应该让她久等。

I invited the vagrant who worked in the neighbouring mill and who apparently spoke Hungarian to help me with the interrogation. Naturally, as you'd expect from a vagrant without a pot to piss in, he was only interested in how much he'd get for it. In the end, though, we reached an agreement and he said he'd help me interrogate the Cuman.
我邀请在附近磨坊里工作的流浪汉来帮助我审问，他显然会说匈牙利语。自然，他就跟所有身无长物的流浪汉一样，他只关心他能挣到几个钱。不过最后我们达成了共识，他说他会帮我审问库曼人的。
I've discovered there's a vagrant working at the neighbouring mill who curses in Hungarian when playing dice. I should go and see him. He might be able to help me with interrogating the Cuman.
我发现了一个在附近磨坊工作的流浪汉。他赌博骂人的时候用的是匈牙利语。我应该问问他能不能帮助我审问库曼人。
Now just to take the roan to Talmberg. That can't be too difficult, can it?
现在只要把马带回塔尔木堡就行。这应该没问题吧?
The groom advised me to talk to Vashek the stableboy. That horse is a little too frisky for my taste.
马夫建议我跟瓦舍克聊聊。这马对我来说有点太活泼了。

One of the presents for Stephanie's cousin was to be a decorative crown. The Sasau master had it almost ready, but the merchant Martin Viezek, who was bringing the Moldavite gem he was going to set in it, hadn't turned up. So I had to go and find this Martin Viezek. He wasn't much fun to be with, but at least I got the stone from him.
准备给斯蒂芬妮的堂妹的礼物之一就是这个装饰性的皇冠。莎邵的大师几乎都准备好了，但那个商人马丁，本应该把绿玻陨石带过来，结果人没出现。所以我得去找到这个马丁。跟他在一起肯定不会有趣，但我至少得把他身上的宝石给找回来。

And the plot thickens. The crown is ready but the moldavite which was to be placed on it has gone missing. A merchant by the name of Martin Viezek was supposed to bring it, but he never arrived. Maybe I can try to find him. He was last seen on the way to Sasau from the north, travelling alongside the river.
事情变得复杂了。皇冠已经准备好了，但是为它准备的绿玻陨石却不见了。一个叫马丁的商人应该带它回来却没露面。也许我可以试着帮忙找到他。他最后被看见的时候是从北方沿着河边往莎邵走。

It was clear as day that the Cuman should be swinging from the Rattay gallows. But the miller didn't agree and wanted to keep the prisoner for his own personal gain, so I decided to make a bold move. I freed the Cuman, but only so I could make a prisoners of him again - where he belongs this time, in the Rattay jail.
众所周知这个库曼人应该在拉泰的绞刑架上被吊死。但是磨坊主不同意，而且因为私欲想要扣留他，所以我决定走一步险棋。我释放了这个库曼人，不过是为了能再一次把他抓住——这一次他就要进拉泰的监狱了。

Whatever the truth about the Cuman's alleged stash, he must stand before Sir Radzig to be judged and it's my duty to bring him to Rattay. Only the miller won't hear a word of it, so I'm left with no other choice than to snatch the captive from him.
不管这库曼人有没有他们所说的赃物，他都必须被拉德季大人审问，而我的职责是把他带到拉泰。但是磨坊主一句话都听不进去。所以我没有别的选择，只能偷偷释放了这俘虏。

It was clear as day that the Cuman should be swinging from the Rattay gallows. But the miller refused to recognize the fact and wanted to keep the captive for his own personal gain. However, once I explained the situation to him, he allowed me to take the prisoner away.
众所周知这个库曼人应该在拉泰的绞刑架上被吊死。但是磨坊主不同意，而且因为私欲想要扣留他，但是当我给他解释后果后，他同意让我带走犯人。

Whatever the truth about the Cuman's alleged stash, he must stand before Sir Radzig to be judged and it's my duty to bring him to Rattay. The miller wasn't too happy about that, but when I explained things to him, he grudgingly agreed. His millhands should hand the captive over to me.
不管这库曼人有没有他们所说的赃物，他都必须被拉德季大人审问，而我的职责是把他带到拉泰。磨坊主对此不太乐意，不过我解释给他听之后他还是不情愿地答应了。他的人应该把犯人递交给我。
I promised the miller I'd bring him back half of the bounty for the Cuman.
我保证过带一半的钱给磨坊主，作为带走库曼人的条件。
The innkeeper Marianna asked me to find proof that Josef is spreading slander about her and her tavern.
酒馆老板玛丽安娜让我证明杰瑞诋毁她和她的酒馆。
By blind luck, I found a bandits' camp in the woods. I could take a look around, but I'd better report it to Sir Radzig.
运气不错，我在林子里找到了一处土匪的营地。我应该四下调查一下，随后最好向拉德季大人汇报。
Leshek is really selling camp supplies in a local tavern. I could surely use that information. Where might he hide all his profits? And what about the camp leader? What would he say about all that?
雷士克真的在当地的酒馆倒卖补给。我确信。他会把赃款藏在哪儿？那军营的总管会对此作何评价？
I gave Josef the cure for his poisoning. I hope he recovers quickly. With a bit of luck, maybe it'll even cure the grouchiness he's famed for in the vicinity. What a Good Samaritan I am.
我给杰瑞解毒剂。我希望能快些康复。万一运气上身，也许可以治疗一些在附近著名的愤愤不平。我是一个多好的撒玛利亚人啊。
It seems Timmy had been working at the mill, but I found out he was afterwards hiding at the Kolbens' farm
看上去蒂米曾经在磨坊工作，但是我发现他现在藏在蔻奔农场。
I should go to the mill and ask about Timmy before he vanishes.
我得赶在蒂米逃跑之前，到磨坊调查一下他的情况。
塞梅克在我帮助他之前就死了。
I should find out how to help Semek. He mentioned some purple herb.
我应该去调查如何帮助塞梅克。他提到了某种紫色的草药。

We conquered the outer bailey! We no longer had anything to fear from the bandits and could storm the castle. Only it turned out that that viper Istvan Toth was holding hostages, among them Sir Radzig and Lady Stephanie. Sir Divish was wounded in the rain of arrows during our attempt to take the castle, the entire outer bailey was in flames and we had no choice but to withdraw.
我们占领了瓮城！这下我们无需忌惮那些土匪的威胁，能够一鼓作气拿下城堡。只是那诡计多端的伊斯特万·托思扣留了拉德季大人和斯蒂芬妮夫人作人质。戴卫斯大人在进攻城堡的过程中被敌人的箭羽所伤，瓮城也燃起了熊熊大火，这种情况下我们别无选择，只能撤退。
Before we can try and get inside the castle, first we have to secure the whole outer bailey.
在我们尝试攻入城堡之前，我们必须要占领瓮城。
The charcoal-burners in the camp to the south of Neuhof don't know Ginger. They told me to go to the woods in the north and ask the other charcoal-burners there.
诺伊霍夫南边营地里的烧炭工们并不认识金杰。他们叫我去北边的森林里问问那里的烧炭工。
The charcoal-burners told me two other armed men were asking about Ginger. I hope I find him before they do.
烧炭工告诉我其他两个带着武器的人问过金杰，我得在他们之前找到金杰。
Things are getting interesting. I came across some dubious types asking after Ginger.
事情变得越来越有意思了，我撞见了可疑的人也在找金杰。
As luck would have it, I stumbled on the pair of bandits who were looking for Ginger and immediately they started a fight with me.
该死！我撞见了两个同样在寻找金杰的土匪，他们二话不说就开始和我动手。
I found out that Ginger went to the west towards Talmberg. There was another charcoal-burners' camp nearby and all I had to do was follow the stream to find it.
我发现金杰向着塔尔木堡的方向往西去了，那里有另一处烧炭工营地。我只需要跟着溪流走就能找到那里。
Sir Divish was warned of the danger. He took all his men and we headed for Vranik together to finally put a stop to Istvan's reign of terror.
我已经把作战计划告知戴卫斯阁下了。他带领着他的全部人马与我们一同杀向弗兰尼克，一举摧毁伊斯特万的恐怖计划。
I must warn Sir Divish of the need to prepare for the imminent attack on Vranik.
我必须告知戴卫斯大人准备偷袭弗兰尼克。
In the end it turned out that the Cuman really does have some money stashed away somewhere. He can't give me the directions to it, but he says he can guide me there personally.
看来库曼人确实在哪里藏了钱。他说不出怎么去，但是他说他会亲自带着我去那里。
Everything is ready for the interrogation. I just need to return to Budin for the prisoner.
审问的一切都准备好了。我只需要回到布金去找囚犯就可以了。
The path begins at the woodcutters' camp in the forest north of Talmberg. To get there, I have to follow the road directly from the castle to the north.
导航源于塔尔木堡北部森林里的伐木工营地。想要到达那里，我得沿着城堡通向正北方的道路一直走。
I have to go straight along the path past the camp until I reach a fork with the ruins of a cabin.
我得沿着小路直走穿过营地，直到我看到废墟边的岔路。
I've got to take the left path at the fork and carry on to the next fork, at a clearing with a big beech tree.
我得走左边，然后再去下一个岔路，就在一块有巨大山毛榉的空地上。
I've got to take another left by the beech tree and go along the path until I come to another junction.
我在山毛榉旁左转，一直走到下一个交叉口。
I've got to go left once more and keep going until I reach a crossroads by a flat rock.
我还得走左边，直到我来到卵石前的十字路口。
I've got to go straight at the crossroads and the camp should be somewhere in front of me.
我得在十字路口直走，营地就在我前方某处。
我给他们的食物下了毒。
I set fire to the hay.
I set fire to the arrows.
I joined Captain Robard's company, which was trying to invade the camp at the point through which I'd made my escape from captivity before. We got inside and went to help with the main attack.
我加入了罗巴德长官的军队，尝试从我脱离虎口的地方进攻敌营。我们成功闯进了营地，以支援主力部队。
I decided to join the assault force that will try to penetrate the bandits' camp from the rear.
我决定从后方渗透进土匪的营地作战。

Karl wasn't exactly overjoyed about entering the monastery, so he was quite willing to let me take his place and to advise me. He told me I needed a writ of acceptance from the Abbot to get into the monastery, which, unfortunately, his guardian, Manfred, had safely tucked away.
卡尔并不期待进入修道院，所以他很乐意让我代替他进入修道院，并且给我一些相关建议。他告诉我我需要一封修道院院长亲手写的文书才能进入修道院，但很不巧，这封文书被他的侍卫，曼弗雷德，藏在了一处极为隐蔽的地方。
I finally have a chance to speak with Karl in private.
我终于有机会与卡尔私下谈谈了
Zach is highly suspicious. I ought to take a very close look at him.
扎克非常可疑。我应该盯紧他。
Zach the blacksmith seemed very suspicious to me, so I looked around and behind his smithy I found several baskets full of crude copper. I was curious what he'd have to say about that.
我认为铁匠扎克看上去十分可疑，所以我环顾四周并在他的铁匠铺后面发现了几个装满粗铜的筐子。我倒要看看他会如何解释这些东西。
I've made a deal with the Cuman. He'll show me where he's hiding the money.
我跟那个库曼人做了个约定。他会告诉我他把东西放在了哪里。

The bandits are still recruiting men for their new encampment, which I need to track down. The only way I can do that is through the local recruiters, or "crimps" as they're called. I don't know where to start though. I suppose I'll just have to ask around. I'll try the taverns and maybe the Bailiff has heard something.
土匪仍在招兵买马以建立新的据点。我必须找出据点的所在。但是首先我需要查出当地的征兵者，就是人称“招募者”的家伙。我不知道从哪里开始。我想应该先去四处打听一下。我要去酒馆那里碰碰运气，或许执政官对此人有所耳闻。
When trying to track down the crimps in Sasau, it occurred to me to talk to the local miller, Simon, who I previously had some dealings with. I'm pretty sure he should know something.
在搜寻莎邵招募者的过程中，我与当地的一位曾经打过交道的磨坊工，西蒙，谈了谈。他肯定对这件事有所了解。

The bandits are still recruiting men for their new encampment, which I need to track down. The only way I can do that is through the local recruiters, or "crimps" as they're called. I should first ask Miller Simon whether he's heard anything.
土匪仍在招兵买马以建立新的据点。我必须找出据点的所在。但是首先我需要查出当地的征兵者，就是人称“招募者”的家伙。我应该先去询问磨坊工西蒙，看看他是否对此人有所耳闻。
When trying to track down the crimps in Sasau, it occurred to me to talk to a wounded man at the monastery who looked like he might know something about untoward goings-on in the area.
在搜寻莎邵招募者的过程中，我与修道院中一位可能对当地可疑之事有所了解的伤员谈了谈。

The bandits are still recruiting men for their new encampment, which I need to track down. The only way I can do that is through the local recruiters, or "crimps" as they're called. I can try questioning a fellow in the monastery infirmary who looked like he might know something about... dishonourable matters.
土匪仍在招兵买马以建立新的据点。我必须找出据点的所在。但是首先我需要查出当地的征兵者，就是人称“招募者”的家伙。我可以试着去修道院的医护所，审问一个看上去对那些……龌龊勾当有所了解的家伙。
The tanner was happy he got his way. It didn't occur to him the brawlers would eventually get fed up and come back again.
皮匠终于满意了。他没想到那群痞子最后会忍无可忍，再回来找他算账。
I should go and tell the tanner how things turned out with the brawlers by his house.
我应该向皮匠报告在他家旁边闹事的那些痞子的情况。

I found out the bandits meet in the evenings right inside the Sasau church, the ungodly bastards! When I came there, they told me they'd only allow me to join them if I undertook a test. And it's no easy one - they want me to infiltrate Sasau Monastery and kill their former crony, Pious.
我调查到这些土匪就在莎邵教堂里彻夜集会，这群亵渎神明的强盗！我前去教堂一探究竟之时，他们告诉我，只有我完成一个任务，他们才让我加入他们。这不是个简单的任务-他们想让我潜入莎邵的修道院，刺杀他们先前的一个同伙，派阿斯。

The recruiters meet in the evening at the Sasau church. On hallowed ground! If there's a light in the church after dark and the door is open, I have to go in, kneel before the altar and wait. Tough words won't help me here - I'll have to pretend I want to join them.
晚上将与招募者在莎邵的教堂会面，就在这神圣之地！如果教堂里亮着光，并且门是开着的，我就得进去，在圣坛前跪下。现在说什么都晚了，我得准备好加入他们了。

Since I had suspicions about Zach the blacksmith, I spoke to his son, Vitus, who was not keen to tell on his father, naturally enough. In the end a few well aimed blows with my fist loosened his tongue. Vitus confirmed my suspicion that they were making copper sheets at the forge.
因为我对铁匠扎克心有疑问，所以我去找扎克的儿子维塔斯谈话，但他自然不会讲他父亲坏话。最后还是用拳头解决了问题。维塔斯的口供印证了我的怀疑，他们确实在铸造铜板。

Since I had suspicions about Zach the blacksmith, I spoke to his son, Vitus, who was not keen to tell on his father, naturally enough. For a blacksmith's apprentice, he wasn't so tough. All I had to do was paint a pretty picture of how he'd end up if he didn't talk and soon he was singing like a nightingale. He confirmed my suspicion that they were making copper sheets at the forge.
因为我对铁匠扎克心有疑问，所以我去找扎克的儿子维塔斯谈话，但他自然不会讲他父亲坏话。作为一名铁匠学徒，他并不那么强硬。 我所做的就是生动形象的描述给他如果他不说话会发生什么，不久他就像夜莺一样唱歌娓娓道来。 他的口供印证了我的怀疑，他们确实在铸造铜板。

Since I had suspicions about Zach the blacksmith, I spoke to his son, Vitus, who was not keen to tell on his father, naturally enough. It wasn't hard to loosen his tongue though - as soon as I mentioned the name of Sir Radzig Kobyla, he told me everything he knew. My suspicions were confirmed - copper sheets were being made at his father's forge.
因为我对铁匠扎克心有疑问，所以我去找扎克的儿子维塔斯谈话，他自然不会讲他父亲坏话。但也没让我多费口舌-一听我提起拉德季阁下的名字他就都招了。他的口供印证了我的怀疑-铜板确实是在他父亲的工厂里制造的。

I met again with that mercenary who's been teaching me to swordfight. This time I didn't get cut like before. But I'm afraid when Father and Mother see my bruises, they might suspect I'm learning swordplay behind their backs.
我又去和最近教我剑斗的雇佣兵见面了。这一次我没像以前似的被砍伤。但我父母看到我身上淤伤的时候我还是很担心，他们可能怀疑我在偷偷学剑斗了。

I started getting some training in sword-fighting from a mercenary who turned up in Skalitz recently. Father and Mother mustn't find out. For some reason they don't want me to learn to defend myself! I got a bit of a cut in yesterday's lesson, though. We're supposed to meet by the alehouse again today.
我跟随最近在斯卡里茨出现的佣兵进行剑斗训练。这件事一定不能让父母知道。不知道为什么他们不想让我学这些防身术！不过我在昨天的训练中受了点儿伤。今天我们应该在酒馆旁边再次见面。

Zach has come up with a plan to disgrace Ota by beating him in a duel with bludgeons. As Zach's champion, I'm to wear a suit of armour made by his son, Vitus, and my opponent will wear Ota's armour. The victor's armour should bring glory to its maker and the loser's only shame.
扎克想了个办法让奥塔颜面扫地，他打算在一场装备决斗中击败奥塔。作为扎克的打手，我需要穿着他儿子维特斯打造的一套铠甲上阵，与此同时我的对手会穿着奥塔的装备与我对峙。胜者的铠甲称王，败者的铠甲为寇。
I offered to help him and I really did manage to get my hands on something.
我答应了帮助他而且我真的弄到了什么。
Urban died and his divine wish along with him.
厄班带着他神圣的遗愿死去了。
I offered to help him. Perhaps I could actually get some of the genuine relics. Or I could get a bone somewhere else. One bone is much like another - how would Urban know the difference?
我答应了帮助他。也许我真的能找到一些圣物。不行的话我就从别处随便找一根骨头。骨头都长得一样，厄班应该弄不清吧？
I arranged to go for a stroll with Theresa, so we walked together up to the meadow beyond Rattay and had a chat.
我和特丽莎约好一起散步，于是我们便边谈边走到了拉泰附近的草坪上。
I arranged to go for a walk with Theresa, just a short stroll to the meadow by Rattay.
我跟特丽莎准备去拉泰附近的草坪上散散步。
I agreed to play blind man’s buff with Theresa in a nearby barn. A great place for some fun and games.
我同意和特丽莎一起到谷仓附近玩蒙眼抓人的游戏。这是个玩游戏找乐子的绝佳之地。
I agreed to play blind man’s buff with Theresa.
我同意和特丽莎一起玩蒙眼抓人的游戏。
Zach and I agreed that instead of having a duel, I'll just steal the suit of armour Ota's working on for the Bailiff. I must say it's a fine piece of work.
扎克和我同意不再进行决斗，而是我直接把奥塔为执政官打造的铠甲偷走。我不得不说这真的是副好铠甲。

I suggested to Zach that I could make the suit of armour Ota's working on vanish. Since it was ordered by the Bailiff, failing to deliver it could hurt Ota's reputation even more than simply losing a duel.
我跟扎克建议说我能让奥塔的心血付诸东流。既然这是执政官定的，那没成功交付到手肯定会比输一场决斗更能损失奥塔的信誉。

I challenged Master Ota to a duel with bludgeons. He's a sly one though. He wanted me to throw the fight and I agreed. After all, he'll compensate for the injury to my honour with coin - and lots of it.
我邀请奥塔大师接受装备决斗的挑战。他很狡猾。他想让我故意输掉对决，我同意了。至少他要对我名誉的伤害补贴上点儿钱——报酬还不少。

I challenged Master Ota to a duel with bludgeons. He's a sly one though. He wanted me to throw the fight, but naturally I declined. I would never stoop so low, and I let him know as much in no uncertain terms.
我邀请奥塔大师接受装备决斗的挑战。他很狡猾。他想让我故意输掉对决，我自然拒绝了。我是不会如此屈服的，我要让他知道无论情况怎样我都是有原则的。
Everything has been agreed with Ota. Now all I have to do is tell the Bailiff about the duel.
奥塔那边搞定了。现在我只需要去把决斗的事情告诉执政官。
It turned out that Ota had no champion, and fought the duel himself. I was caught unawares and in the end I lost the duel. Zach wasn't too pleased about that, unsurprisingly.
结果奥塔没有找任何打手，他亲自参加了决斗。我不小心输掉了决斗。扎克对此不是很满意，这不出所料。
It turned out that Ota had no champion, and fought the duel himself. I was caught unawares, but in the end I still managed to win the fight.
结果奥塔没有找任何打手，他亲自参加了决斗。我不小心被抓住了弱点，但我还是赢下了决斗。
It turned out that Ota had no champion, and fought the duel himself. All the better for me - it would be harder to throw the fight if my opponent wasn't clued in to our little intrigue.
结果奥塔没有找任何打手，他亲自参加了决斗。这对我有利——如果我的对手不亲自现身的话，我更不容易故意输掉决斗。
Zach will have a reward for me for my victory in the duel. I must stop by and get it at his forge.
扎克给我准备了一份胜利之后的报酬。我得去他那领取奖励。
Even though I lost the duel, I still have a reward coming on account of my deal with Ota. I should go and pick it up from him.
尽管我输掉了决斗，我仍旧从奥塔那里得到了一份报酬。我应该去他那里领取。
I went to ask Alex to advise me on selecting people for the jobs. He wasn't keen on it, but in the end he agreed to send me candidates.
我想去找阿历克斯求得选择员工的建议。他起先对此事并不上心，但后来他还是答应给我一份合适人选的名单。
Before I even start looking for carriers, I should talk first to Alex, the son of the Skalitz Bailiff, who's now speaks for the Skalitz survivors. He should be able to help me.
在我招聘挑水工之前，我应该先跟斯卡里茨执政官的儿子阿历克斯谈谈，他现在代表斯卡里茨幸存者。他应该能帮到我。
The Captain was already waiting at the training arena to try me out.
巴纳德队长已经在训练场等你去训练了。
I'm supposed to go and see Captain Bernard at the training arena by the Upper Castle in Rattay. He's usually there from mid-morning until evening.
我该去拉泰上城堡的训练场找巴纳德队长。他一般从上午到晚上都在。
Her wish is my command. I got jobs for Antonia and Vincent and Theresa is happy.
她的愿望就是我的命令。我给安东尼娅和文森特找到了工作，特丽莎也很高兴。
我不在意特丽莎的愿望。
Theresa wants me find work for Antonia and Vincent.
特丽莎想让我给安东尼娅和文森特找到工作。
Once again I met up with my lovely mill-maid. I wondered where it would all end up.
我又一次与我亲爱的磨坊女孩约会了。我很好奇这次我们会去哪。
I should definitely visit my favourite mill-girl again.
我该再去拜访我最喜欢的磨坊女孩了。
I got rid of those two bandits who were pursuing Ginger. Then I just had to tell Ginger he had no need to fear them any more.
我干掉了那两个寻找金杰的土匪，现在我只需要去告诉金杰他没必要再担惊受怕了。
Ginger asked me to deal with the bandits who've been looking for him. He's afraid they'll find him and kill him.
金杰让我去干掉那几个追踪他的土匪。他害怕他们会把他找出来杀掉。
I briefed Sir Radzig on everything I found out, how I found Ginger and what he told me about the bandits. Sir Radzig gave me permission to continue by tracking down the limping bandit from Uzhitz.
我向拉德季大人简单汇报了我的调查，包括寻找金杰的过程和他关于土匪的描述。拉德季大人许可我接下来去乌兹茨找出那个跛子土匪。
Captain Bernard told me I should report to Sir Radzig who was riding by and stopped to ask how things were progressing.
巴纳德长官告诉我拉德季大人恰好骑马路过，我应该去当面向他汇报。
It looks like the local stable has a number of sick horses. Maybe there's a way to take advantage of that? Or, on the contrary, I could help them...
这里的马棚里好像有些马生病了。也许可以利用这个机会？或者我可以帮助他们？
I found out from the herb woman that to keep the horses out of action for a few days, all I need is to brew a poison potion. It seemed like the only option.
我从草药婆哪里得知，想让马匹这几天内都不能行动，我只要做点毒药就行。看起来这是我唯一的选择了。
I found out from the herb-woman that if I want to make sure that none of horses can ride for a couple of days, I just have to cook up a classic poisonous potion.
我从草药婆那里得知如果我不想让人们这几天里有马骑的话，只要做点普通的毒药就好了。
Matthew has taken due note of this information. It looks as if the robbery is truly about to happen.
马修已经了解这些信息了。看起来抢劫是真的要开始了。
Now I know when the money will arrive at the quarry. If there is nothing else to find out, I can tell Matthew and we'll get ready.
现在我知道什么时候钱会到达采石场了。如果没有别的我想知道的事了，我就可以告诉马修我们准备好了。
I found out the soldiers will arrive at the quarry with the wages in five days.
我得知，五天后，士兵们就会带着工钱到达采石场
I found out the soldiers will arrive at the quarry with the wages in four days.
我得知，四天后，士兵们就会带着工钱到达采石场
I found out the soldiers will arrive at the quarry with the wages in three days.
我得知，三天后，士兵们就会带着工钱到达采石场
I found out the soldiers will arrive at the quarry with the wages in two days.
我得知，两天后，士兵们就会带着工钱到达采石场
I found out the soldiers will arrive at the quarry with the wages tomorrow.
我得知，明天，士兵们就会带着工钱到达采石场
I found out the soldiers will arrive at the quarry with the wages today.
我得知今天士兵们就会带着工钱到达采石场
I should put all the ingredients in the incense burner.
我应该把这些原料都放在熏香炉里。
Now I have to burn the plants.

Then, at night, me and the Apothecary cast a spell from the banned book over the grave of the person who was disturbing the dead man's rest - his wife, Lada. After our ritual, hopefully Alois will finally be able to rest in peace.
然后，在晚上我和草药师用禁书向魂绕死人——他的妻子——的坟墓上施法。希望能让他安眠。
Cast the spell over the grave of Alois' wife, Lada.
I finally got my hands on the banned book of spells - Necronomicon. Stealing it from Sasau Monastery proved the only option.
我拿到了死灵之书。看来从莎邵修道院偷出来是唯一的办法。

The book is called Necronomicon, one of the 'libri prohibiti', books banned by the Church, so there may be one locked away at the monastery. The monks aren't likely to give it to me just for asking nicely though. I'll probably have no choice but to steal it.
书叫做死灵之书，一本被教廷封禁的禁书，所以可能有一本会在修道院看管着。僧侣可能不会在我要的时候开心的给我。我只能偷过来。
I told the groom that the poison I brought will help the horses. He even thanked me. Those horses definitely won't be going anywhere for the next couple of days.
我告诉马夫这个我拿的毒药可以治好那些马。他还感谢了我。那些马这几天绝对哪儿也去不成了。
I helped the groom with his horses. They should be healthy soon. But I don't think my mates, the would-be quarry robbers, will thank me for it.
我帮马夫治好了那些马。它们应该很快就会康复了。但我不觉得我即将成为采石场强盗的朋友们会因此感谢我。
I helped Rock with his arm. Maybe now he'll be fit for work.
我帮助石头治疗了他的胳膊。也许这样他就能工作了。
One of the candidates for the jobs, Rock, has an injured arm that's not healing. Naturally, he won't be able to do any heavy carrying like that, so I promised to get something to help him.
一位前来应聘的员工，石头的胳膊受伤了还没有痊愈。自然，他那样没法干重活而，所以我答应给他找点东西来帮他。
There were several charcoal-burners' camps between Neuhof and Uzhitz. The westerly path to the woods from the crossroads by Neuhof led to one, and from there to the west along the stream was another.
在诺伊霍夫和乌兹茨之间还有几个烧炭工营地。诺伊霍夫十字路口有一条向西进入森林的小路，会指向其中一个营地，从那里沿着河流继续向西则是另一个营地。
The charcoal-burners usually need wood and water for their work. I had to look for them along the streams flowing through the woods. All I had to do was find one that flowed out from the woods.
烧炭工工作时既需要木材也需要水，我需要沿着林子里的溪流寻找他们。我现在需要做的是找到一条源于森林的溪流。
I stole the Groschen. Now to get out of here quick!
我偷到钱了。现在赶紧走！
Now I know enough to carry out the raid. Hopefully all will go well.
现在我已经有足够多信息来安排袭击了。希望一切顺利。
Me and Matthew have agreed to just charge right in.
我和马修同意直接冲进去。
We're going to steal the coin as planned.
我们要按照计划把钱偷走。
Me and Matthew agreed that I'd try to sneak in to the quarry to steal the money while he and Fritz watched my back from a little way off.
我和马修同意，由我悄悄溜进采石场把钱透偷出来，同时他和弗利兹在远处帮我放风。
We've agreed that I'm to sneak into the quarry and steal the workers' wages.
我们一致决定，由我负责偷偷溜进采石场把工人们的薪水偷走。
Me and Matthew agreed that I'd try to sneak in to the quarry and steal the money while he and Fritz made a scene close by to distract the guards.
我和马修同意，由我偷偷进采石场偷钱，同时他和弗利兹在附近制造动静引开守卫。
We've agreed that I'm to sneak into the quarry and steal the workers' wages. Meanwhile, Fritz and Matthew will distract the guards' attention.
我们一致决定由我溜进采石场去偷工人们的薪水，同时弗利兹和马修会吸引守卫的注意力。

After talking to the charcoal-burners from the north, it seemed to me they knew Ginger, although that doesn't mean much. After all, they were close by Neuhof and since Ginger spent time enough wandering in the woods, he could easily have met them.
和北边的烧炭工交谈后，我发现他们认识金杰，但是这并不能说明什么，毕竟他们离诺伊霍夫还不远，而且金杰经常在森林里闲逛，他随随便便就能和他们照过面儿。
I found out that if I head off west from the northern camp and stick close to the stream, I should find another charcoal-burners' camp.
如果我从北边的营地的出发，沿着溪流向西走，我能找到另一处烧炭工营地。
I looked at the Rattay Black Chronicle. There was a record in it that could well be about Lubosh's cronies, but I didn't know if that was enough to help me find any of them.
我看了《拉泰罪犯实录》，里面有可能关于卢波和他的同伙的记载。但我不知道那是否可以帮我找到他们吗？
There are records in the Rattay Black Chronicle about local reprobates, hopefully including Lubosh and his cronies.
在《拉泰罪犯实录》里有关于当地争端的记载，希望有关于卢波和他的同伙的记载。
We know when they'll bring the money to the quarry. We agreed that Matthew and Fritz will get closer to the quarry. Before we go into action, I should stop by and talk to them about a plan of attack.
我们知道他们什么时候会把钱带到采石场。我们达成一致，马修还有弗利兹会离采石场近一点。在我们行动之前，我应该去找他们谈谈进攻计划。
In the end I had to leave the monastery under circumstances that will make returning there impossible.
最终我不得不离开修道院，已经不可能再回去了。
I should flee the monastery right now before things really heat up.
我现在应该尽快逃离修道院，免得事态严重下去。
I informed the bandits that I'd succeeded in murdering Pious.
我告诉土匪我已经成功杀了派阿斯。
My task is complete. Now I should find the bandits and tell them about my success.
我的任务完成了。现在，我应该去找那些土匪，告诉他们事情办成了。
The fire I lit in the swamp signalled the bandits that I'd done my job. They came to meet me as agreed, we talked and I gave them Pious' die.
我在沼泽地点了一把火，通知那些土匪我已经完成了任务。他们按照约定来与我会和，交流过后，我把派阿斯的骰子交给了他们。

With Antonius's die, I have proof that I've killed Pious. Now, I just have to take it to the bandits. I'm supposed to meet them in the swamp near the monastery. Once I'm there, I have to light a fire to signal them that I made it.
有了安东尼斯的幸运骰子，我获得了派阿斯已被我杀死的“证明”。现在我只需要把这个骰子带给土匪们了。我应该到修道院附近的沼泽地与他们会面。一旦到了那里，我要点起一团火把，通知他们我已经完成任务了。

The alarm was raised in the monastery and the whole place was searched for the murderer. So as not to raise suspicion, I went with the others to the courtyard, where an investigation was being conducted.
修道院的警报声响起了，他们在到处找着凶手。为了不被怀疑，我和其他人一起来到了庭院里，大清查便在那里展开了。
Panic has broken out in the monastery. Everyone has been called to the courtyard.
恐惧在修道院中蔓延。所有人都被召集到了庭院里。
Scribe Friedrich wanted me to get him some embrocation for his aching knees. That stuff costs an arm and a leg, but I managed to get some in the end.
弗里德里希文书想让我帮他搞些治疗膝痛的药膏。这东西简直是天价，但最后还是被我搞到手了。
I have to go to the Apothecary Konyash in Rattay to get embrocation for the scribe so he'll let me look in the Black Chronicle.
我得去药商科尼亚什那里给文书取点药膏。这样，他就让我查阅《拉泰罪犯实录》
I found out that Captain Robard planned to send an entire squad to the quarry to guard the money. That didn't sound good.
我发现罗巴德队长计划派一整队人护送钱到采石场。这听起来可不妙。
Captain Robard wanted to send a whole squad to escort the quarrymen's wages, but I persuaded him to send less men.
罗巴德队长想派一整队人去护送采石工的薪水，但我说服了他少派些人手。
I should show the original in the Abbot’s handwriting to Konrad.
我得把修道院院长的字迹，拿去给康拉德看。
I knew it wouldn’t be straightforward. Konrad is free to leave, but doesn’t want to. He found out there's an old acquaintance of his in Sasau and he believes it's an assassin sent to kill him.
我就知道这不会一帆风顺。康拉德可以走了，但他又不太想了。他发现莎邵有个熟悉的面孔，他怀疑这是被派来杀他的刺客。
I must tell Konrad everything is taken care of and he can leave for Talmberg.
我必须要告诉康拉德所有事情都办妥了，现在它可以走了。
At the end of the patrol, I had to ring the bell on the Rathaus to announce the end of the day in Rattay, which I was glad to do, as it also meant the end of my duty.
巡逻的最后，我敲响了钟声，传达了拉泰宵禁的命令。我还是很乐意的，因为这说明我也下班了。
In Rattay the end of the day is announced by ringing the bell that hangs at the Rathaus. Today, the job fell to me.
在拉泰，宵禁的命令是由市政厅外大钟的响声传达出的。今天，这件事交给我来做了。

The last thing that had to be done was to see that the taverns closed at the appointed hour. I had to deal with the Traders' Tavern by the square, which didn't go entirely smoothly in the end, since young Lord Capon was celebrating boisterously in the alehouse and was in no mood to stop. Of course he wouldn't heed me, since he is in fact the Lord of Rattay, or at least he will be when he comes of age, which is something I reminded him about. A bit insolent, I know, but he insulted me, the Bailiff and even Sir Hanush. Anyway, he took exception to the way I spoke to him and started a fight, which was fortunately interrupted by Sir Hanush. To punish both of us he took me off sentry duty and assigned me to Sir Hans as his page. I'm supposed to go hunting with him in the next few days.

最后一件事是去确认酒馆们都在规定时间里关门了。我负责去看广场边的商人酒馆，不过事情不是很顺利。卡蓬少主在酒馆里欢庆，没有丝毫要停下来的意思。他当然不会听我的——这不出意料，因为他是拉泰的领主，他成年以后就是了。我提醒了他这一点。我知道这有点无礼，但他侮辱了我、执政官还有瀚纳什大人。汉斯·卡蓬大人不喜欢我对他说话的方式，然后开始向我动手，幸亏被瀚纳什大人及时阻止。作为我们两个的惩罚，他解除了我的守卫工作，然后让我效命于卡蓬大人。我应该不久就会去和他打猎。
All that's left is to see that the taverns close. Nightingale is closing the one by the upper gate and I have to deal with the Traders' Tavern by the market square.
现在只剩确认酒馆关门了。夜莺去确认正门边的酒馆，我得去确认在集市广场的商人酒馆。
The monastery doesn't just let people come and go as they please. To get out, I needed a means of unlocking the door, which I did.
修道院的大门是不能随便让人进出的。想要逃脱的话，我得会一点撬锁技巧，这难不倒我。

It's no easy matter getting out of the monastery. I will need the keys to the door or at least some lockpicks. Brother Cellarius has lockpicks. If I want to get the keys, I'll have to steal them from the Prior.
出修道院绝非易事。我需要大门的钥匙或者至少有撬锁器。塞拉厄斯修士有撬锁器。如果我想要拿到钥匙，我就必须从长老那里偷一把出来。
I got everything needed for my escape with Antonius - blood, a wineskin and a means of unlocking the door.
我已经拿到了我和安东尼斯为出逃准备的所有东西-血液，皮囊，以及一套开锁工具。
I have everything needed for my escape with Antonius - blood, a wineskin and a means of unlocking the door. Now I can go back to Antonius.
我已经拿到了我和安东尼斯为出逃准备的所有东西-血液，皮囊，以及一套开锁工具。我现在我得去向安东尼斯汇报。

I couldn't get Master Kyeser to calm down. He was still scared out of his wits, so I had to creep around outside his house at night and watch out for assassins. And indeed, Master Peychar turned up after a while...
我还是没能让康拉德冷静。他还是处于战战兢兢的状态。所以我在院里埋伏好了，准备等刺客上钩。果不其然，培沙大人出现了……
Master Kyeser is terrified. He thinks Sigismund has sent assassins to get him. He wants me first to find out what’s going on and to keep watch after dark outside his house.
康拉德被吓得魂飞胆破。他觉得西格斯蒙德派人来杀他了。他想让我去调查调查，并在入夜后埋伏在他的住所外面。
In the end, I let Peychar go. I really didn't think he was an assassin out to kill Master Kyeser.
最后，我放培沙走了。我真不觉得他是来杀康拉德大人的刺客。
If I believe that Peychar really isn't out to assassinate Konrad Kyeser, I should let him go.
我相信培沙不是来杀康拉德大人的刺客，所以我放他走了。
Captain Robard briefed me on the situation in the camps and mentioned a few things they needed help with.
罗巴德长官给我讲了军营的情况，提到了一些需要我帮忙的事项。
Sir Divish wants me to have a word with Robard about the state of the camps.
戴卫斯大人让我去找罗巴德了解营地的情况。
The soldiers have already reached the quarry. If I want to try anything, now is my only chance!
士兵们已经到采石场了。如果我想干什么的话，现在就是我唯一的机会！
It seemed to me the easiest way to get out of the monastery was to get the keys to the door, which I soon managed. Now I can come and go as I please! Only I'd better not be seen.
据我观察，离开修道院的捷径在于找到大门的钥匙。我很快就搞到手了。现在我可以随进随出了！只是要注意不要让人看见。
To get out of the monastery, I need the keys to the main door. The Prior ought to have them.
我需要大门的钥匙才能出修道院。钥匙应该在长老那里。
Brother Cellarius could have got me the keys to the monastery, but he charged me an arm and a leg. Anyway, I brought him the coin and he delivered the keys.
塞拉厄斯修士可以能帮我搞到修道院的钥匙，但天下没有免费的午餐。总之，我一手交钱，他一手交了钥匙。
If I can get 200 Groschen for Brother Cellarius, he’ll get me the monastery keys.
如果我能给塞拉厄斯修士200格罗申，他就会帮我搞到修道院的钥匙。
At Captain Bernard's urging, I visited a herb-woman to see if she had some potion to keep the men on their feet.
在巴纳德长官的要求下，我去拜访了一位药婆，看看她有没有能让士兵精神饱满执勤的药水。
Captain Bernard's main concern is that the men are tired and prone to falling asleep on duty. One of the herbalists could brew up a tonic for them to ward off fatigue and perk them up for battle.
最令巴纳德长官头疼的是士兵们经常在站岗的时候打瞌睡。有个药剂师说可以调制出一种药水，让他们精神饱满，并可以在战场上使出全力。
Feyfar was visibly relieved that I managed to enlist the help of master siege engineer Konrad Kyeser. And he was generous with his recompense. We will have our trebuchet!
在我把攻城器械专家康拉德·吉赛尔大人请来后，费法尔明显轻松了许多。他不用着急了，我们将拥有我们的投石机！
Now just to let Master Feyfar know he's not to worry - he shall have his trebuchet!
现在就需要去告诉费法尔大师他解脱了，他会完成投石机的！
I’ve made such a commotion, surely nobody will come today. I'll just have to come again tomorrow night.
我今天搞砸了，应该没人会来了。看来我只能明天晚上再试试了。
After a suitable interval I joined Sir Hans at the bathhouse, and he was in fine form when I caught up with him. It certainly seemed his visit to the baths was doing him a world of good.
过了一阵子，我去澡堂找到了汉斯大人，他看起来还不错。看起来去澡堂的确对他很有帮助。
I promised Sir Hans Capon I'd come and join him at the bathhouse in Rattay. I have to give him a head start and let him become better acquainted with one of the bathhouse wenches.
我答应汉斯卡蓬大人，要陪他去拉泰的澡堂。我得让他跟一个搓澡妹打好关系。
Sir Hans wanted me to play dice with Zdena, but she was no beginner. Lord Capon's state of undress was proof of that!
汉斯大人想让我跟泽戴娜玩骰子，但是她可是老手了。瞧瞧卡蓬大人都脱成什么样了，那就是最好的证明！
I've got to play Zdena at dice to get her back for beating Sir Hans. I hope I do better than he did!
我要在玩骰子时赢过泽戴娜，因为她打败了汉斯大人。我希望我比汉斯大人强！
Sir Hans wanted me to strip and get into the tub with him. Probably didn't want to drink alone.
汉斯大人想让我脱光衣服，跟他一起进浴缸。他可能不想一个人喝酒吧。
Enough of dice. I'll ask what's next.
玩够了。我去问问接下来该干什么。
Satisfying the whims of His Lordship is no easy matter. I got wine for him in the middle of the night. Who knows what he'll want next.
满足少主大人一时的心血来潮可真不容易。我大半夜地给他拿来了酒，谁知道他接下来又想要什么。
I have the wine Lord Capon wanted. Now all I have to do is bring it to him.
我现在有卡蓬少主要的红酒了。现在我只需要把酒送给他。
Sir Hans was in fine form when I caught up with him. It seems his visit to the baths is doing him good.
我见到汉斯少主时，他看起来很好。似乎去澡堂对他的确有好处。
I can still go to the Rattay bathhouse to see Sir Hans, as he invited me.
我还是可以去拉泰澡堂见汉斯大人，他邀请过我的。
As agreed, I met with the Apothecary at night at the crossroads near the grave of Alois' wife, Lada.
和约定好的一样，我和草药师在坟墓附近的岔路口碰面了。
I'm supposed to meet with the Apothecary at night at the crossroads by Ledetchko. From there we'll go together to the grave of Alois's wife.
我需要晚上和炼金师在拉迪亚茨克的岔路那里碰面。然后我们一起去找他妻子的坟墓。
The foe doggedly defended the second gate leading to the inner fortifications, because they had nowhere left to retreat to. But we managed to break through it. Istvan's end was imminent!
敌人顽固地龟缩在内部防御工事的大门内，因为他们已然走投无路了。我们最终突破了第二道大门。伊斯特万死到临头了！
It's not over yet! We'll take the last gate by force. The bandits can't resist us for much longer.
还没结束呢！我们要强行进攻最后一道大门。土匪们撑不了多久的。
We found an unfinished letter written by Istvan to some lord. So he had some other ally we didn't know about!
我们找到了一封伊斯特万写给某个领主的未完成的信。这证明他身边还有我们所不知道的同盟存在！
Istvan and Erik have their main camp here. There's sure to be some clue here as to where they might have gone.
伊斯特万和厄里克的大本营就在这里。这里肯定有透露他们去向的蛛丝马迹。
I had a good scout around for the things they took from me on my last visit. And lo! My codpiece, at last! That's what I missed the most!
我好好找了一番被扣押时他们从我身上夺走的东西。我的内衬，终于找回来了！我太想念它了！
The things they took from me the last time I was here must be lying around somewhere. I'm not going to leave them here, even if some of them are useless to me now.
他们从我那里抢走的东西肯定就藏在某处。我不会把它们白留在这里的，就算有些东西已经没有用处了。
How does Istvan manage to be always one step ahead? His deviousness is matched only by his diabolical treachery!
怎么老是让伊斯特万抢先一步？他真是既狡猾又可恨！
This letter from Istvan's tent... someone's got to take a look at it right away.
这是从伊斯特万的营帐找到的信件……得立即上交。
I've got to get enough mint for the herb-woman.
我得去帮采药婆采集足够的薄荷。
I've got to get enough valerian for the herb-woman.
我得去帮采药婆采集足够的缬草。
The herb-woman says a little wormwood added to the potion will enhance its effects.
采药婆说一些艾草就是点睛之笔，应该采点儿。

To help the Merhojed villagers rid themselves of the pestilence, I first had to find out more about it, a risky task that I took upon myself. I went to the houses marked with white crosses and when ever possible talked to the afflicted to find out what the trouble was.
为了帮助莫霍杰德民众摆脱瘟疫，我得先调查清楚症状等信息，这是一项冒险的工作。我拜访了被标有白色十字架的人家，有可能的话，我得听病人亲自说说症状。
If I'm to help, first I'll have to find out more about the ailment. It will be easy enough to find the sick villagers, because Melichar the village elder has marked their doors with limewash crosses.
如果我要帮忙，就得先查明症状。想找到生病的村民相当容易，因为梅立恰尔已经往生病的人家的门上标记了白色十字架。
To help Karl slip away to a new life, I had to get the purse of coin his guardian was holding for him.
为了帮助卡尔逃出生天、重获新生，我得为他偷来在他侍卫那里扣押着的钱包。
In order for Karl to escape, he needs the money that Manfred has.
为了能让卡尔逃跑，他需要曼弗雷德的钱。
One of the charcoal-burners told me Ginger is friends with a pair of twins among them. He said if I follow them, they'll surely lead me to him.
一位烧炭工告诉我金杰是一对双胞胎烧炭工的朋友。他说我只需要跟着他们就能找到金杰。
All I had to do was threaten one of the charcoal-burners and he told me Ginger was hiding out in a smallholding on the northern edge the woods towards Uzhitz.
我仅仅威胁了一个烧炭工他就招了。他告诉我金杰正躲在乌兹茨方向的林子最北边的一个小农房里。

That treacherous charcoal-burner fobbed me off with lies! I scouted out all the smallholdings and Ginger is nowhere to be seen. I might have expected as much from a Judas who'd sell his friends to anyone for a bit of silver. But I paid the bastard back for his treachery!
那个骗子骗了我！我搜遍了所有的小农房，都没有金杰的影子。我以为他就是像犹大一样嗜财卖友的人。但我也给了那个骗子点儿教训！
I successfully helped the wounded in the monastery, all least all the ones I could help.
我成功地帮助了修道院里的伤员，至少做了力所能及的事。
Johanka asked me to help the wounded from Skalitz. I should have a look in the infirmary to see how they're doing.
乔汉卡托我帮助斯卡里茨的伤员。我应该到医护所里去看看他们的情况。
I got some nutritious game meat for the infirmary. Now at least the sick will have some decent food.
我为医护所的伤员打到了营养丰富的猎物。现在他们至少能吃上体面的饭食了。
The sick in the monastery need some nutritious food. I'll try to find some game meat.
修道院的伤员需要营养丰富的食物。我得试图打到猎物，给他们取肉。
The sick in the infirmary had to endure very poor conditions. Brother Nicodemus advised me to talk to the Custodian, who apparently fell out with Johanka.
医护所的伤员在恶劣的休息环境中饱受煎熬。尼可丹姆斯修士建议我去找看门人谈谈，那个看门人却明显纠缠着乔汉卡不放。
They have unsatisfactory conditions in the infirmary. Maybe infirmarius Nicodemus knows more?
医护所的环境很差。也许医护人员尼可丹姆斯可能会知道更多情况？
I had a good man-to-man talk with the Custodian and in the end I persuaded him to release some supplies for the sick and wounded. It will certainly give them some relief.
我和看门人光明正大地进行了一番交流，最终我说服他为伤员提供更多的供给。这对伤员帮助很大。
I should try to get supplies from the Custodian for the sick.
从看门人那里拿到伤员的供给品。
I found Father Simon, who knows something about poisoning. He told me Philip needed to have his intestines purged.
我找到了西蒙神父，他懂得中毒的症状及治疗方法。他告诉我应该清洗菲利普的肠道。

Father Simon from Skalitz knows about poisoning and should be able to help Philip, but he left years ago. There's still talk in Rovna of him being seen though. Maybe it wouldn't a bad idea to find out if there's any truth is in the rumours.
西蒙神父了解中毒的症状，但他几年以前就离开了斯卡里茨。只是罗弗尼还有关于他的传言。也许去那找他不失为一个好主意。
I found Father Simon, who knows something about poisoning. He told me Philip needed to have his intestines purged.
我找到了西蒙神父，他懂得中毒的症状及治疗方法。他告诉我应该清洗菲利普的肠道。
Philip needs Father Simon's help. I have to go and see him!
菲利普需要西蒙神父的帮忙。我得去找他。
The best thing for purging the intestines is Artemisia potion. I got some and gave it to Philip to drink.
艾叶药水是最好的洗胃药剂。我搞点来给菲利普喝。
Artemisia potion is the best remedy for purging the guts. I should get some somewhere.
艾叶药水是最好的洗胃药剂。我应该把这东西搞来。
Philip really did recover. He'll soon be completely healthy!
菲利普好多了。他马上就能痊愈了！
Unfortunately, I didn't help Philip on time and he died.
很不幸。我没能及时救治菲利普，他死了。
I'll have to wait at least two hours to see if the remedy helps Philip or not.
我只需要等待两个小时，看药剂是否对菲利普有效。
I got bandages for Hannes' injured leg.
我为汉斯的伤腿找来了绷带。
Unfortunately, Hannes didn't get help on time and he died.
很不幸。汉斯因为没能及时接受救治，死掉了。
为汉斯的伤腿找到绷带。
Brother Nicodemus treated Hannes in the end. I didn't feel capable of doing it.
最后是由尼可丹姆斯修士为汉斯治疗了伤腿。我没有亲自治疗他的自信。
Hannes died. It seems he was in more acute need of bandaging than I thought.
汉斯死了。看上去他比我想象的还要更急需包扎。
Tell Nicodemus to tie up the wounded.
告知尼可丹姆斯去为伤员包扎。
I dealt with the bandits as I was asked. They wouldn't be threatening anyone any more. I hoped that would put Ginger's mind to rest and he'd no longer feel his life was in danger.
按烧炭工的要求，我已经干掉了土匪。他们不再威胁到任何人了。我希望这能使金杰平静下来，让他知道他已经脱离危险了。
Ginger asked me to deal with the bandits who've been looking for him.
金杰让我去干掉那几个追踪他的土匪。
One lightly injured man couldn't get to sleep in the infirmary. After the potion I gave him, he should sleep like the dead.
医护所里的一位轻伤员无法入眠。在喝下我给他的药剂之后，他会睡得像个死人。
One lightly injured man couldn't get to sleep in the infirmary and asked me to get him some remedy.
医护所里的一位轻伤员无法入眠，想让我帮他找点治失眠的药剂。
Ginger wants to go back to the stud farm, but he's afraid the people there will distrust him and won't take him back. He asked me to go there and pave the way for him.
金杰想回到种马场，但他顾忌种马场的其他人会不信任他而拒绝接纳他。他想让我去替他说情。

I went to the stud farm to ask if Ginger could come back there. Mistress Zora consented in the end and Ginger was glad to hear the news. He told me he'd have something for me if I stop by when he's back there.
我回到了种马场询问金杰是否能回归种马场，佐拉夫人最后还是赞成了，金杰很欣慰。他说如果我以后再来种马场他有礼物相赠。
The folk at the stud farm agree that Ginger can go back. No doubt he'll be happy about that.
种马场的人同意金杰回归。毫无疑问他会非常欣慰这个结果。
I went to Neuhof on Ginger's behalf to ask Mistress Zora if she'd take him back. She refused though. Ginger took the news with a brave face.
我去诺伊霍夫代表金杰问佐拉夫人她是否接受金杰回去。她拒绝了。金杰平静地面对了这一事实
The folk at the stud farm don't want Ginger back. He won't be pleased.
种马场的人不同意金杰回归。他不会满意的。
Ginger promised me if I talk to the folk at the stud farm on his behalf, he'll teach me some horse-whispering trick.
金杰承诺如果我替他去种马场说情，他以后会教我些马术。
I met a widow in one of the stricken houses, who asked me if I'd help her get her dead husband buried. So I took a spade and dug a grave for him under the linden tree behind the house.
我在一户被感染的人家外面遇见了一个寡妇，她请求我帮她掩埋她丈夫的尸体。所以我取了一把铲子，在屋子后面的菩提树下为她丈夫挖了个坟墓。
I promised the widow I'd help her by digging a grave for her dead husband.
我答应寡妇帮她挖一个坟墓掩埋她死去的丈夫。

I gave the dead man a decent burial, although in unconsecrated ground. His soul will just have to wait a while in Purgatory until some priest has the courage to come to Merhojed and risk the pestilence.
我体面地安葬了死者，尽管这片土地并非神圣。他的灵魂只得在炼狱中委屈片刻，直到牧师有胆量冒着瘟疫的危险来到莫霍杰德为他处理后事。
I have to carry the dead man to the grave.
我得把尸体带到坟墓埋葬。
There's a woman crying on Gallows Hill. Maybe the Executioner can tell me something about her.
有个女人在绞架山哭泣。可能刽子手能告诉我关于她的事情。
From what I heard, Timmy was working at the mill until recently, but Mirka clearly lied about that.
据我所知，蒂米曾在磨坊工作，直到最近才失踪，所以米尔卡很显然是在撒谎。
Mirka claims she doesn't know anyone called Timmy. That's suspicious. I should ask someone else from the mill.
米尔卡坚持说她不认识蒂米。这很可疑。我应该去问问磨坊里的其他人。
It seemed Mirka didn't want to talk about Timmy in front of others.
看上去米尔卡不想当着任何人面谈论蒂米的事。
The other people at the mill know Timmy. I'm very interested to hear what Mirka has to say.
磨坊里的其他人都认识蒂米，我很想知道她将如何自圆其说。
I've managed to save some of the wounded in the monastery. Unfortunately, I couldn't help all of them…
我成功救治了修道院里的一些伤员。不幸的是，我没能帮助所有人……
All the wounded in the monastery died. Johanka won't be happy...
修道院里所有的伤员都死了。乔汉卡会大发雷霆的……
I got bandages for Hannes, who had an injured leg. It should be enough even for re-bandaging.
我为汉斯的伤腿找来了绷带。应该足够重新包扎了。

I travelled to Sasau to ask Johanka's advice about the pestilence. She couldn't help, but she did point me to Brother Nicodemus, who gives physic to the sick and should be able to help with the Merhojed sickness.
我前往莎邵去请求乔汉卡出主意帮忙阻止瘟疫。她无计可施，但她向我引荐了尼可丹姆斯修士，他是个医生，应该知道如何平息莫霍杰德的瘟疫。
I must talk to Johanka. She ought to know how to help the folk in Merhojed.
我得和乔汉卡谈谈。她应该知道如何帮助莫霍杰德的村民。
I found Elishka's relatives. They didn't seem at all keen on taking her in, but in the end I talked them into it.
我找到了伊利施卡的家人。看上去他们并不愿意收留她，但最终还是在我的劝说下屈服了。
I found Elishka's husband's relatives. But talking them into taking her in won't be so easy.
我找到了伊利施卡的亲人。但是说服他们收留她可不是件易事。
The Bailiff apologized and gave me a reward.
执政官道歉了并给了我奖赏。
I gave Vincent's will to Father Fabian.
我把文森特的遗嘱给了法比安神父。
Vincent of Merhojed asked me to take his last will and testament to Father Fabian in Sasau. He wants to disinherit his wayward son, Elijah.
莫霍杰德的文森特要我把他的临终遗嘱带给莎邵的法比安神父。他想要剥夺他那任性儿子伊利亚的继承权。
I thoroughly grilled the captive bandit. I'm not sure whether he told me everything he knows, but fear of the executioner certainly loosened his tongue.
我彻底的拷问了俘虏的土匪。我不确定他是不是对我仍有所隐瞒，但刑罚的威胁确实是撬开了他的嘴巴。
I'm to interrogate the bandit who was captured during the raid on Merhojed and get what information I can out of him.
我要去审审莫霍杰德袭击期间俘虏的土匪，看看我能得到什么信息。
Once I got to Merhojed, I went to see my friend Matthias, who's settled there. Unfortunately, it turned out he'd been seriously injured during the bandit raid.
我刚到莫霍杰德就去看了住在那里的马蒂亚斯，我的朋友。很不幸，他在土匪袭击期间身负重伤。
My friend Matthias is in Merhojed. Since I have to go there anyway, I can go and see how he's doing.
我的朋友马蒂亚斯就在莫霍杰德。反正我要去那里，正好能去探望他一眼。

I managed to get to the gate and raise the portcullis! Finally there were enough of us to fight through to the castle. Only that viper Toth was holding Lady Stephanie and Sir Radzig hostage. Sir Divish was wounded in the rain of arrows during our attempt to take the castle, the entire outer bailey was in flames and we had no choice but to withdraw.
我成功的进入了大门并升起了吊门！现在我们有足够的人进入城堡战斗了。只是那诡计多端的伊斯特万·托思扣留了拉德季大人和斯蒂芬妮夫人作人质。戴卫斯大人在进攻城堡的过程中被敌人的箭羽所伤，瓮城也燃起了熊熊大火，这种情况下我们别无选择，只能撤退。
If I can get to the winch of the portcullis, we can let the rest of our men inside. But that means going through the whole outer bailey.
如果我能找到打开门闸的机关，我们就能让剩下的人进来。但你要穿过整个瓮城。
Sir Radzig ordered me to report to the Bailiff, who assigned me to guard duty with guardsman Jaroslav, known as Nightingale. And I honestly hope to avoid running into Sir Hans for a long while.
拉德季大人命令我去向执政官报告，后者委任我和雅罗斯洛夫，一位人称“夜莺”的守卫，一起巡逻。我真心希望这段时间里不要再碰到汉斯大人了。
I’ve finished with my training and now have to make myself known to the Bailiff.
我完成了我的训练，现在我得去向执政官报告。

I saw a horse I could take to flee to Talmberg, only nearby I also saw three of Sigismund's soldiers trying to rape Theresa, the miller's daughter. I couldn't just let that happen, and even though I was outnumbered, I managed to help her.
我找到了一匹可以帮助我逃到塔尔木堡的马，但在附近我也看到了三个试图强暴特丽莎的西格斯蒙德的士兵。她是磨坊工的女儿。我不能见死不救，并且就算敌众我寡，我还是帮她逃脱了。
There's a patient in the infirmary with a bandaged leg. Even though the wound doesn't look so bad, he's pale and doesn't react. I have to find out how I can help him.
在医护所里有位伤员的腿接受了包扎处理。就算他的伤情不算严重，他的脸色看上去很苍白，也动弹不得。我得看看如何帮助他。
Unfortunately, Thomas died. I could still set his leg, but he won't get much benefit out of it.
很不幸，托马斯死了。我还能为他接骨，但已经为时已晚。
Johanka isn't giving the wounded man any chances. Maybe it's a long shot but I could try to ask the executioner from Rattay.
乔汉卡觉得那个断腿的伤员不可能存活下来。也许有时间的话我可以去向拉泰的刽子手请教一下。
I didn't help the man with the broken leg in time and unfortunately he died.
我没来得及救治断腿伤员，他不幸去世了。
I know how to set the wounded man's leg. Now just to do it.
我知道如何为伤员接骨了。现在我只需要抓紧去做。

I opened Kunesh's trunk and found there the hammer and nails he hadn't paid for, as well as a few other things. I also took back the axe he got from Father. I could get enough money to cover the costs by selling everything.
我打开了库尼什的箱子，发现里面有他没付过钱的锤子和钉子，还有一些其他东西。我也拿走了他从父亲那里讹到的斧头。把这些都卖掉应该就够弥补支出了。
I had to go and tell Father I couldn't get Kunesh to pay his debt. Father gave me coin and said he'd deal with Kunesh himself.
我还是得回到父亲那里，并且承认我没能向库尼什讨到债。父亲给了我点钱，并且说他他会亲自前去对付库尼什。

I've found all the pages of the torn-up book. They were hidden in all sorts of places - in trunks, between other books, in the cellars, even in the Prior's study. Now they're all back together as they should be.
我找齐了那卷被撕毁书的所有书页了。它们被藏在各种地方，箱子里面，其他的书中间，地下室里，甚至还藏在了院长的办公室里。现在它们全被装订回它们该在的地方上了。
Once I find all the scattered pages, Brother Librarian will put the book back together and return it to its rightful place in the library.
当我找齐了所有失散的书页，图书管理员就会把书装订回一起，然后放回图书馆正确的位置。
I managed to get my hands on the forbidden book Brother Nevlas wanted. He was glad, because he believes he'll find a cure for the ailing Abbot Peter in the text of the ancient Arab sage.
我成功取到了内弗拉斯修士想要的书。他很高兴，因为他能在这本书里为饱受病困的修道院院长皮特找到治疗方案。
I have to creep into the library at night and steal and Arabic book from the cabinet containing forbidden books.
我得深夜潜入藏书室，从禁书室里窃取一本阿拉伯著作。
The cabinet of forbidden books will be locked, so I'll have to either get hold of the key, which Brother Librarian carries, or pick the lock.
禁书室会被上锁，所以我要么去管图书管理员讨来钥匙，要么就得去撬锁。
I have broken into the Abbot's chambers and read the records he kept of the recently arrived novices. I learned a number of interesting things.
我已经潜入了长老的书房并读了关于学徒的记录。我了解了很多有意思的事情。
I have found out that the abbot (and now the prior) keep records of all the novices in the monastery. I could find a clue in my search for Pius there, but I'd need to break into their study first.
我查出修道院院长（现在是长老）一直在记录所有修道院的学徒。我可以在那找出搜寻派阿斯的线索，但是我要先闯入他们的书房。
I have the forbidden book. Now I have to take it to Nevlas.
我有了禁书。现在，我要把它带给内弗拉斯。
I broke into the Abbot's chambers and read the records about the new novices. I learned some interesting things...
我已经潜入了长老的书房并读了关于学徒的记录。我了解了很多有意思的事情。
I've found out that the Abbot (and now the Prior) keep records of all the novices in the monastery. I could find a clue in my search for Pius there, but I'll need to break into their study first.
我查出修道院院长（现在是长老）一直在记录所有修道院的学徒。我可以在那找出搜寻派阿斯的线索，但是我要先闯入他们的书房。

I'm still not sure whether I'm really so indispensable, or Sir Divish just didn't want to have to tell Sir Radzig his son was killed. Whatever the reason, Sir Divish urged me to keep back from the front line in battle.
我还是不明白为什么在戴卫斯眼里我这么不靠谱，还是他只是不想让拉德季大人知道他儿子战死了？不管是哪个原因，他不想让我上前线。
It seems Sir Divish wants to speak to me in person about something important. I'd better not keep him waiting.
看起来戴卫斯大人有要事要单独分咐我。我最好别让他等太久。
After the interrogation, I took the bandit to Rattay, where he's now rotting in jail.
审讯之后，我把土匪带到了拉泰，他现在正在监狱里腐烂。
The interrogation is over and it's time to take the captive to Rattay jail.
审讯已结束，是时候把俘虏带回拉泰监狱了。

I reported to Sir Radzig about everything that happened in Merhojed and what I'd found out. He heard me out, then gave me another task - I was to meet the merchant who dealt with handing over the money and material for the counterfeiters' workshop.
我向拉德季阁下汇报了调查进展。他听取了我的汇报，并给了我另一个任务- 去会见与假币原材料相关的那个商人。
I have to report to Sir Radzig and brief him on the situation.
我得向拉德季阁下汇报并且简要说明情况。
The priest told me to sit down.
Friedrich owed me a favour, so he helped me to interpret the records in the Black Chronicle. Apparently, one of Lubosh's accomplices was holed up in Ledetchko!
弗里德里希欠我个人情，所以他帮我解读了《拉泰罪犯实录》里的记录。果不其然，卢波的一个同谋就躲在拉迪亚茨克！
Now I have to go to the scribe and he should show me the Black Chronicle. If I can't figure out the records for myself, I expect he can help me with that.
现在我得去找文书，他会让我查阅《拉泰罪犯实录》。如果我不能自己查阅记录，我希望有人能帮助我一下。
I was back where I started. So I asked around again and found out there might be some record of Limpy Lubosh in the Rattay Black Chronicle and maybe I could find some clue there.
我所有的努力都付之东流了。于是我又四下打听了一下发现在《拉泰罪犯实录》上可能对跛子卢波有些记载。也许我能在那里找到点线索。
So I'm right back where I started. I'll have to ask around if anyone else knows about Lubosh - maybe the town Bailiff? If not, perhaps Sir Radzig or Sir Hanush can advise me.
所以我所有的努力都付之东流了。我得去周围打听一下有没有人知道卢波的信息。可能执政官知道些？如果他不知道，也许拉德季大人或者瀚纳什大人能给我些指示。
I figured Friedrich, the Rattay scribe, would help me out with the Black Chronicle.
我想弗里德里希，那个拉泰文书，会帮我查阅《拉泰罪犯实录》。
Friedrich the Rattay scribe can surely help me. Only I've a feeling he'll expect something from me in return...
拉泰文书弗里德里希肯定会帮助我。我觉得他会从我这换取点什么东西。

The person Konrad suspected of intrigues against him was one Master Peychar, who had been with him on Sigismund’s campaigns. I made inquiries about him at the tavern and then even talked to the man himself. He didn’t look suspicious, just another cloth merchant.
康拉德怀疑培沙大人是来杀他的，他曾与康拉德一同共事与西格斯蒙德麾下。我在酒馆里和人们聊过他，也和他本人聊过。我感觉他并不是很可疑，就是个普通的商人。
Konrad suspects a certain Master Peychar, who was with him on Sigismund’s campaigns, of intrigues against him. If I'm ever to get Konrad to Talmberg, I'll have to find out more about this Peychar.
康拉德怀疑培沙大人是来杀他的，他们曾一起共事于西格斯蒙德麾下。如果我想把康拉德带回塔尔木堡，我就得把这个培沙调查清楚。

The person Konrad suspected of intrigues against him was one Master Peychar, who had been with him on Sigismund’s campaigns. I made inquiries about him at the tavern and then even talked to the man himself. He didn’t look suspicious, just another cloth merchant.
康拉德怀疑培沙大人是来杀他的，他曾与康拉德一同共事与西格斯蒙德麾下。我在酒馆里和人们聊过他，也和他本人聊过。我感觉他并不是很可疑，就是个普通的商人。
Konrad suspects a certain Master Peychar, who was with him on Sigismund’s campaigns, of intrigues against him. I hear this Peychar is to be found in the Sasau tavern.
康拉德怀疑培沙大人是来杀他的，他们曾一起共事于西格斯蒙德麾下。我听说这个培沙时常出现在莎邵的酒馆。
Instead, Sir Divish ordered me to lead a group of Skalitz men in a flank attack on Havel Medek's forces. I reached the designated place right on time.
戴卫斯阁下派我去带领一队斯卡里茨士兵侧翼伏击哈维尔·梅德科的人马。我按时到达了指定地点。
The battle is about to begin. I'd better have something to eat and sleep a little while I can. God knows when I'll have another opportunity.
战斗很快就会打响。我最好趁着有时间在作战开始前吃点儿东西再睡一会儿。天知道我下次能休息是什么时候了。
I found out that another of the patients, Philip, was poisoned and I had to act quickly if I was to save him.
我发现有为名叫菲利普的病人中毒了，我必须立即治疗他。
I have to find out what happened to Philip. Maybe Nicodemus or Johanka will know.
我得查明菲利普的病情。也许尼可丹姆斯或者乔汉卡会知道。
The spell didn't work though. Drahomira complained that Alois' ghost was still visiting her.
那个咒语没起效果。德侯米娅向我抱怨阿洛伊斯的鬼魂还爱缠着她。
I should find out from Drahomira if the spell worked.
我应该见见德侯米娅看咒语起没起效果。
Maybe it would be worth talking to Ulrich. He might know where to start looking.
与伍尔里希谈话可能会很有帮助。他或许知道该从哪里开始着手调查。
Someone in Sasau is supplying the counterfeiters with copper sheets. It won’t do any harm to check out the local forges.
莎邵有人在为假币伪造者提供铜板供应。最好去调查一下当地的铁匠。
The forgers need quicksilver to make their amalgam. It’s definitely not a run-of-the-mill item and someone from Sasau must be providing it.
伪造假币的过程中需要水银来制造银汞合金。这不是一般的化学物质，源头肯定来自莎邵。
I met Captain Bernard and his company in the courtyard where they were mustering.
我在巴纳德长官和他的士兵集合时赶到了。
There was no company of soldiers in the courtyard. They really didn't wait for me!
庭院里根本没有部队。他们并没有等我！
I have to join the soldiers in the courtyard of the Upper Castle in Rattay. I'm even going to get a horse there!
我要在拉泰大城堡的庭院里加入部队。我甚至还能得到一匹马！

I've reported Fritz and Matthew's plan to rob the quarry, which will open the Gates of Hell to my lifelong friends. But there was nothing else I could do. And now, if I don't want to watch them falling into a trap, I'd better just wait and see how it turns out.
我已经出卖了马修和弗利兹的采石场抢劫计划，我和我一辈子的朋友们的友谊从此就走到了尽头。但是我也别无办法。而现在，如果不想亲眼看着他们掉进陷阱里，我还是等着看结果如何吧。
Fritz and Matthew are dead. My boyhood friends from Skalitz are gone.
弗利兹和马修死了。我斯卡里茨的儿时好友已经不在了。
Fritz and Matthew are dead. My old friends. Andrew will certainly be glad to hear it.
我的老友们，马修和弗利兹已经死了。安德鲁听到这个一定很高兴。

It might not have been a nice thing to do to my friends, but I couldn't let those good-for-nothings rob the quarrymen of the wages they'd earned by the sweat of their brows. Some might call it treachery, but this province needs law and order, not more bandits. And Captain Robard commended me for my honesty.
也许我不该对我的朋友做这种事，但是我也不能放任这俩游手好闲的家伙把采石场工人的血汗钱抢走。有人可能会说这是背叛，但是这片土地需要的是法律和秩序，而不是更多的匪徒。罗巴德队长也对我的诚实表示了赞扬。
I ratted on them all: Andrew, Fritz, and Matthew. Robard told me he'd take care of it and that I should come to see him in a few days.
我出卖了他们所有人：安德鲁，马修和弗利兹。罗巴德告诉我他会处理这些的，然后我会几天后去再找他。
I got lockpicks, which should be enough to get me past the monastery door.
我拿到了撬锁器，这下应该就能打开修道院的大门了。
If I can’t get out of the monastery with the keys, I could do with some lock picks.
如果我找不来钥匙出修道院，我可以用撬锁器出去。
I got back to the monastery with the cask of wine before anyone even noticed I was gone.
没人发现我带着一桶酒回到了修道院。
The cask of wine the Brother Circators want for their night-time revelries is in the Custodian's cellar. Well, it's not going to come rolling to me all on its own!
巡察使修士要为夜宴准备的酒就在看守人的酒窖里。当然不会有天上掉馅儿饼的好事。
I couldn't get enough pitch for setting the gate alight. Captain Robard wasn't too happy about it.
我没法拿到足够的沥青，罗巴德长官对此很不爽。
We could use some pitch to set fire to the gate. I should go and ask the nearby charcoal-burners if they have some to spare.
我们可以用些沥青点着城门。我可以去问问周围的烧炭工看他们有没有可以给我们的沥青。
I hunted down some game and brought the meat to the quartermaster to keep the encampments going for some time.
我打了些猎，然后把鲜肉带到了采石场营地的军需官那里，这样应该可以解决几天的需求。
I could hunt down some game and bring the fresh meat to the quartermaster in the camp by the quarry.
我可以多打些猎，然后把鲜肉带到采石场营地的军需官那里。
I managed to get ale for the soldiers. I hoped they wouldn't swill it all down in a couple of days.
我帮他们搞到了些酒，但愿他们不会喝得像个死猪一样躺好几天。
There's no ale left in the camps and not a single keg to be found in Talmberg. I'll have to ask at the local alehouses if they can spare a keg or two.
军营里已经没有酒了，塔尔木堡这边儿也一桶都没有了。我得去周围的酒馆问问，看看他们能不能提供一两桶。
Our dead could finally be buried with the dignity that befits Christians. I arranged for a priest to come and give them the last rites.
我找来了神父为死去的弟兄们送行，他们终于可以像一个神圣的基督徒一样走了。
We need a priest in Talmberg to take care of the dead and dying and it would be good for the morale of the troops too. I should try and find a priest who'd be prepared to do it.
我们需要神父来为死去的和濒死的弟兄送行，虽然救不了他们了，但是也能提振一下部队的士气。我得找找哪个神父愿意来做这件事。
The physician from Sasau Monastery was able to take the time to come to Sir Divish's camp and take care of our wounded and dying.
莎邵修道院的医师可以去医治戴卫斯大人，并照顾伤员。
We have many wounded and dying men in need of medical help. I should go to the monastery and ask what they can do.
我们有很多伤员需要医治，我得去修道院看看那儿的人能不能帮忙。

A former neighbour, Beran, who's now among the refugees in Rattay, told me he had left valuables hidden away in Skalitz. His wife was pushing him to go and get them, but he was afraid to go there on account of the dangerous marauders he heard were still looting there. It seemed a shame to leave Beran's stash untended, so I went looking for it. And true enough, under a dove-cote I found a silver goblet and a nice pile of Groschen hidden.
巴朗，我的一个乡亲，现在跟难民一起住在拉泰，他告诉我说他在斯卡里茨藏了些有价值的东西。他的老婆催促他去取回它们，但是由于听说仍有危险的土匪在那里劫掠的缘故，他不敢前去冒险。不能坐视巴朗的宝藏不管，所以我决定去找找看。的确，在鸽子笼下面我找到了一个银高脚杯和几大堆藏起来的格罗申。

A former neighbour, Beran, who's now among the refugees in Rattay, told me he left valuables hidden away in Skalitz. He's afraid to go there himself and get them. It would surely be worth my while to go and check it out.
巴朗，我的一个乡亲，现在跟难民一起住在拉泰，他告诉我说他在斯卡里茨藏了些有价值的东西。他不敢自己去拿。那东西值得我前去查看。
I read the Prior's schedule outlining my daily routine and the duties I would have to perform during my time in the monastery.
我读了长老的时间表，列出了我的日常工作，以及我在修道院期间必须履行的职责。
I got a document from the Prior with instructions for monastery life and my daily routine. I'd better read it.
我收到了来自长老的文件，提供了修道院生活和日常作息的指导。 我最好读一下。
I spoke to all the other novices in the monastery, but it still didn't shed any light on which one of them was Pious.
我与修道院内的每个学徒都交流过了，但我仍没有头绪他们中哪个才是派阿斯。
Apart for me, there are four other novices in the monastery. Pious is one of them and to figure out which, I'd better get to know them all.
除我以外，修道院中还有四个学徒。派阿斯就混迹其中，为了把他找出来，我需要认识所有学徒。

Brother John, a Circator and candidate for the Abbot's post, asked me to find something to discredit his rival, Brother Nevlas. I agreed to be his eyes and ears and bring him anything I could get on Nevlas.
约翰修士，一位巡查长，觑觎着修道院院长的位子，派我去找出能让他的对手，内弗拉斯修士，颜面扫地的证据。我答应成为他的耳目，调查内弗拉斯。
Brother John, a Circator and candidate for the Abbot's post, asked me to find something to discredit his rival, Brother Nevlas.
约翰修士，一位巡查长，觑觎着修道院院长的位子，派我去找出能让他的对手，内弗拉斯修士，颜面扫地的证据。
Every piece of dirt I could find on Nevlas could be used. I informed Brother John that Nevlas wanted me to steal a forbidden book.
我从内弗拉斯那里调查到的蛛丝马迹都可以派上用场。我将内弗拉斯派我窃取禁书一事告知了约翰修士。
Circator John will surely be interested to hear that Brother Nevlas tried to get me to steal a forbidden book.
巡查长约翰肯定对内弗拉斯修士让我窃取禁书一事感兴趣。

Brother Nevlas, who is standing for Abbot, wanted to know what was going on in the monastery, things that are normally shrouded to the eye and ear. I became his spy and told him about the corrupt Circators.
正在为竞选修道院院长做准备的内弗拉斯修士想知道修道院里发生的不义行为，这些行为常是避人耳目的。我成为了他的间谍，将巡查长腐化的行为向他检举了。
Brother Nevlas, who is standing for Abbot, would like to know what is going on in the monastery, things that are normally shrouded to the eye and ear. If I find anything out, I should tell him.
正在为竞选修道院院长做准备的内弗拉斯修士想知道修道院里发生的不义行为，这些行为常是避人耳目的。如果我发现有此类行为发生，就要向他报告。
The race is starting at noon tomorrow in front of the Talmberg town gate. The most important thing is for me to go there on Zora's dappled grey. Otherwise, it will be all for naught.
赛跑会在明日中午塔尔木堡城镇大门之前举行。最重要的是我得骑着佐拉的玉花骢去。要么就是在做无用功。
What a race! Divish will certainly want to speak with me.
这是多精彩的一场比赛啊！戴卫斯肯定有话想对我说。
But we fought off the attack! The trebuchet still stood and Istvan lost even more men.
我们击退了偷袭！投石机毫发未损，而且伊斯特万还损失了更多的人。
I have to get to the trebuchet as quickly as I can and help defend it.
我必须尽快赶到投石机那里，然后和弟兄们一起防守。

I went to Novice Jodok and asked him straight out what his involvement is in the Brother Circators' night-time merriment, to which he replied that he knew about it, but didn't have the nerve to confront the senior brothers, so he even ended up acquiring their wine supplies.
我找到学徒约都克，向他直截了当地询问了他与巡察使修士夜间酒宴的关系。他给出的答复是他确实知晓此事，但不敢与前辈们对着干，所以只好接受了他们送来的红酒。
It's interesting that Novice Jodok has something to do with the Circators’ nocturnal drinking bouts. I should question him about it.
有意思的是，学徒约都克可能与巡察使的连夜酒宴有些牵扯。我应该去找他问问这件事。

Novice Lucas told me about his problems with the Brother Circators. He found out they were boozing in the cellars at night and wanted to report it to the Prior. Only before he could do it, they got wind of it and made his life Hell.
学徒卢卡斯向我讲述了他与巡察使修士之间的冲突。他发现了巡察使连夜喝酒以后，想向长老揭发这件事。只是还没来得及揭发，风声就泄露了，巡察使们随即便开始整他了。
I should talk to Novice Lucas and find out why he's got trouble with the Brother Circators.
我应该去和学徒卢卡斯谈谈，查出来他为何会与巡察使修士有过节。

The counterfeiters needed quicksilver for making the silver amalgam. As luck would have it, my investigation led me to a master fresco painter, currently staying at the Sasau Inn. He'd been to the monastery three times already to get supplies of quicksilver, which he needed to mix red paint, and each time he was sent away empty-handed. The painter suspects the Overseer’s hand of refusing to sell him the quicksilver, because he has other plans for it.
造假者需要水银来制造银汞合金。 幸运的是，我的调查让我找到了一位现在住在莎邵客栈的大师壁画家。 他为了得到混合红色油漆的水银已经去过三次修道院了，但每次他都被空手送走。画家怀疑监督不想给他水银是因为这些水银另有用处。
Ulrich told me that there’s a fresco painter staying at the Sasau inn. He’s anxiously awaiting some stock from the monastery, including quicksilver.
伍尔里希告诉我有个壁画画家住在莎邵酒馆。他在十万火急地向修道院讨要材料，其中包括水银。

I crossed paths with the Overseer's hand and found out what was actually happening in the monastery storehouse. Naturally, it was the hand himself who was behind it and selling the quicksilver to the forgers. He described two people to me, some kind of knight who calls himself Jezhek, and his manservant, Rapota. He was the one he always met up with at the wayside chapel on the hill west of Sasau.
我撞见监督的助手并发现了修道院里实际发生的事情。当然，是他自己在把水银卖给伪造者。他告诉了我两个人，一个自称杰西克的骑士，还有他的仆从，拉波塔。他就是在莎邵西边山上的路边小教堂里遇见的那个人。
The quicksilver trail leads to the Overseer’s office. According to the fresco painter, the Overseer’s hand is deliberately holding back the quicksilver he has.
水银的线索直接引向监督的那里。据壁画画家说，监督的助手故意不给他库存里的水银。
I have the forbidden books in my reach. Now I just have to open the lock.
我已经能触及禁书了。我现在只要打开锁就行了。

I had a little chat with Master Feyfar and it bore fruit. The Master Engineer surmised that in addition to the quicksilver and copper sheets, the forgers would also need a stamping die. He told me there was one engraver staying in Sasau, a Master Jerome of Silesia, who happened to be an acquaintance of his. Of course, Feyfar didn't suspect Jerome himself, but he thought he might be a useful source of information.
我和费法尔法师聊了一会并有了结果。总工程师推测，除了水银和铜板之外伪造者还需要冲压模具。他告诉我，有一个雕刻师就在莎邵，西里西亚的杰罗姆大师，恰巧是他的熟人。当然，费法尔自己并不怀疑杰罗姆，但他认为他可能是一个有用的信息来源。
Master Feyfar might be in Sasau by now. I ought to report my findings to him and discuss what to do next.
费法尔大师现在可能已经到达莎邵了。我应该去向他汇报我发现的线索并讨论下一步行动。

It seems that the master engraver really doesn't know anything. But his apprentice, Florian, caught my attention. According to his Master, Florian has been acting strange of late and seems very anxious.
看来雕刻师真的不知道什么。但他的学徒弗洛里安引起了我的注意。据大师说，弗洛里安最近行动十分诡异并胆小如鼠。

Making false punch dies for Prague Groschen requires skilled and experienced hands. And no one has more experience around here than Master Jerome of Silesia. Master Feyfar is convinced he can't be personally involved, but I ought to leave no stone unturned.
为造假布拉格格罗申而制作模具需要精湛的手艺。西里西亚的杰罗姆大师就是这门手艺的佼佼者。费法尔大人认定他不会与这件阴谋勾结，但我还要彻底清查所有线索。
According to the Master’s description, Florian is definitely on my list of suspects. I need to talk to him.
根据大师的描述，弗洛里安确实形迹可疑。我得和他谈谈。
Rapota will be following Florian on his way to work and back. Apart from which he often sits on the market square and watches Florian’s house.
拉波塔会在弗洛里安工作的路上及回家的时候跟踪他。除此以外，他常会在商业广场上坐着，注视着弗洛里安的屋子。
The mastermind of the entire counterfeiting operation is some Moravian robber baron, Sir Jezhek of Ronow. He must be brought to justice.
伪造假币的幕后主使就是摩拉维亚暴乱者，罗诺福的杰西克阁下。他必须被绳之以法。
Sir Radzig charged me with Jezhek’s interrogation.
拉德季阁下命我去审讯杰西克。
I had to get permission to enter the construction site. Brother Overseer consented to my examining the site of the accident and sent me to the Master Builder to find out more about the accident.
我获得了进入建筑工地的许可。监工答应我去调查发生事故的工地，并且让我去找建筑师，他会告诉我更多关于事故的细节。
I have to talk to Brother Overseer, who's in charge of the whole monastery grounds, and get permission from him to enter the construction site.
我得去和监工修士谈谈，他负责修道院的大小事宜，获得他的准许后，我便可以进入建筑工地。
Zach will surely reward me handsomely for stealing the Bailiff's armour. I'd best go and see him.
扎克肯定会慷慨的奖励我成功偷走执政官的铠甲。我最好去见见他。
I examined the site of the accident - a pool of blood at the foot of the steps, a bloody stone nearby and I could clearly see the place where the stone broke off.
我检查了事故地点的情况-在台阶上有一滩血迹，一块血淋淋的石头就在附近，它脱落的地方也能很清楚地看到。
I must take a look around and see if I can find anything that will clarify what happened.
我得到附近查看一番，看能不能找到一些给事故定性的证据。
They told me in Talmberg that the bad stone definitely didn't come from the quarry there. They were certain someone must have switched it.
塔尔木堡的人告诉我劣质石料肯定不是从他们的采石场运过来的。他们确信是有人在运送过程中给石料掉了包。
I should show the broken stone block to someone from Talmberg quarry and ask if they can tell me anything about it.
我应该拿着那块伤人的石料到塔尔木堡采石场找人问问，看他们对此作何解释。

I heard some rumours about Leshek the scaffolder finding some demon's skull during excavation of the footing for the scaffolding. Leshek told me he took the skull down to the river to get rid of it so as not to spread panic.
据传言说，吊架工雷士克在挖掘吊架基台的时候找到了一具恶魔的头骨。雷士克告诉我，他已经把头骨带到河边扔掉了，免得再引起恐慌。
I heard some rumours about Leshek the scaffolder finding some demon's skull during excavation of the footing for the scaffolding.
据传言说，吊架工雷士克在挖掘吊架基台的时候找到了一具恶魔的头骨。
The skull seemed genuine enough to me, but the knacker told me it's just a well-made fake assembled from a human skull and deer antlers.
虽然在我看来，这是个货真价实的头骨，屠户告诉我它就是个用人类头骨和鹿角做的高仿头骨。
The skull looks genuine enough, but it would be best to talk to someone who understands such things - maybe the knacker? If he'll be willing to talk to me.
这东西看上去很精致，但我最好与比我更了解这方面的人士谈谈-也许可以去找屠夫？要是他愿意跟我说话就好了。

Once I found out the skull was a fake, I decided to put pressure on the scaffolder to find out if he put it there himself. But there was neither hide nor hair to be seen of him. No doubt he knew his wrongdoings would come to light and fled while he could.
证实头骨是伪造的之后，我打算去给吊架工施加点压力，查出来是不是他自己把头骨放在那地方的。但他早就跑得无影无踪了。他肯定意识到情势不妙，趁着能跑先走一步了。
The skull is a fake. I should put some pressure on the scaffolder to talk. Who knows, maybe he put it there himself!
这是个假头骨。我应该去威胁一下那个吊架工，八成就是他自己放在那的呢！

Zmola told me Leshek was going to come to the foot of the scaffolding in the evening to confess to him and I should come there too. Only, instead of Leshek and Zmola, there was a murderer waiting for me!
莫拉跟我说雷士克今晚要在吊架下面对他坦白交代一些事情，我也应该跟他一起去见雷士克。只是，等待我的不是雷士克和莫拉，而是个杀人魔！
Apparently Leshek will come to meet me and Zmola this evening by the foot of the scaffolding and confess to us. I'd better be there on time, in case he changes his mind.
很显然雷士克要在今晚来吊架下见我和莫拉，向我们坦白一些内情。我最好按时赶过去，免得他改了主意。
Each day in the monastery begins and ends with communal prayer, followed by mass in the church. It seems I can somehow excuse myself from prayer, but attending mass is compulsory for all.
每天修道院都会以全体祈祷来开始和结束，在这之后要在教堂做弥撒。看起来我可以请假不去祈祷，但是弥撒是所有人强制参加的。
The workshop is located in an abandoned gallery in the Skalitz mines.
工厂就藏在废弃的斯卡里茨矿洞坑道里。

The secret stash I found under a slab in the church gallery was Siskin's - he admitted it himself. He claimed he was hiding mementos of his past life and coin he stole from his family, who forced him to enter the monastery.
